campaign.story:
Introducing the Everyday Bags
Like all Peak Design products, our new bags are packed full of features and meticulously engineered. They are designed from the ground up to be both the best camera bags and the best everyday carry on the planet.
Skip ahead to: Backpack | Backpack Size | Tote | Sling | Range Pouch | Specs | FAQs
How to get them
Become a backer of this project and pick a reward. You will essentially be pre-ordering one of our new bags. You'll get a special backer discount, and you'll receive your stuff before it is available in stores. Want to buy more than one? Check outAll Rewards & Add-ons. Still confused? Check outHow to Back this Project.
We have no traditional investors. Instead, we launch products here on Kickstarter. The funds we raise here not only go towards manufacturing, they also help us design future products.
Are these camera bags?
Let's make one thing abundantly clear: these ain't just camera bags. They're Everyday bags—crafted by a team of designers, engineers, and photographers to meet the needs of everyone in the modern world. 
We may have cut our teeth in the camera accessories world, but these bags are for everyone, just like our (award-winning*) Everyday Messenger that we designed and launched a year ago with the help of renowned adventure photographer Trey Ratcliff. Peak Design Everyday Bags are unrivaled as camera bags and uncompromising as everyday companions.
Everyday Backpack
Simply put, a backpack without compromises. Available in Charcoal and Ash, and in 20L and 30L sizes. Unless otherwise specified, all pictures are of the 20L Everyday Backpack.
What makes the Everyday Backpack so stacked?
Find your size
Looking for detailed specs on size and laptop/tablet carry capacity? See our FAQ at the bottom of this page.
                                                                                                                                                                                 Everyday Tote
The classic tote bag, completely reimagined to protect, organize, and provide lightning-fast access to your camera gear and everyday carry (think beach, gym, traveling, diapers, etc). Available in Charcoal and Ash.
What makes the Everyday Tote so dope?
                                                                                                  Everyday Sling
The ultimate low-profile, quick-access day bag for light carry and daily excursions. Makes a great bag for beginning photographers or pros who just want to carry essentials. Also a fantastic option for the non-photographer who just wants a sleek everyday bag. Available in Charcoal and Ash.
What makes the Everyday Sling so bling? 
Range Pouch
The Range Pouch is specifically designed to protect and carry lenses on belts, straps, or in bags, available in three sizes. Like our Everyday Bags, the Range Pouch is intelligently designed, expandable, versatile, and feature-packed.
Why do we vouch for the Range Pouch?
                  Comparison and Specs
How to Back
1. Choose a reward level.
Everybody can choose one (and only one) reward level to back this project. You cannot choose 2 reward levels. Just one. You will get all items in that reward—you cannot swap things that you don't want for things that you do want. See the FAQ for why we can't do this.
2. If you want to add something, check out the Add-On Menu.
If (and only if) you want to add something additional to your reward, check out the Add-On Menu below. If it's in the Add-On Menu you can add it to your reward by increasing your pledge by the amount specified in the menu. You can only add things to your reward that are in the Add-On Menu.
If you want to add on a Peak Design product that you don't see in the Add-On Menu, don't worry. We'll give you a chance to do that after our campaign ends. See the FAQ for further explanation.
3. Relax, you're done for now.
All details like shipping information, color preference, and add-on specifics will be collected via survey after this campaign has ended.
Rewards and Add-Ons
1% For The Planet
This year we have the privilege of joining 1% For The Planet. In doing so, we pledge to donate 1% of our revenue (gross revenue, not just profit) to a group of certified environmental nonprofits.
Please note that per Kickstarter guidelines, we cannot use this crowdfunding project to raise funds for charity. We will certainly support our beneficiary orgs outside of Kickstarter, and celebrate this commitment with our backer community.
Thank you for your support!
We can't say it enough. Thank you for believing in us. We can't wait to get these new products in your hands.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is Peak Design's 6th Kickstarter project. We don't want to toot our own horn too vigorously (nobody likes an overly vigorous tooter) but we've got some great experience under our belts on how to manufacture high-quality goods and fulfill lots of orders for them. We've also been blindsided more than once by completely unexpected issues and always dealt with them in a way that leaves every last customer happy with their purchase and proud to support our company.

In short, we know what we're doing, and you should be very confident that we will deliver what we say we will, when we say we will. And we solemnly swear that should unforeseen issues come up, we will handle them with the utmost transparency and care for you, our backers.

Supply Chain Risk: We're incredibly proud of our supply chain, and have a lot of confidence that we can make what we say we'll make, when we say we'll make it. But know what? Sometimes 10 shipping containers of product get stuck outside a shipyard for 3 weeks. We pad our schedule for these kind of things, but sometimes not enough.

Acts of God: We're based in San Francisco. That means we could have an earthquake. Or we could have a massive spur-of-the-moment parade involving wacky costumes and public nudity. Or, god forbid, the Dodgers could come to town. Whatever happens, we'll get through it together. We promise.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Last Chance to Back Mobile, by Peak Design! Our 10th Kickstarter (and it'll only cost a dollar).
updates.update_content:
Hello Backers,
Joe here, from the PD Marketing squad. Hope you're enjoying your PD gear. I wanted to drop a quick reminder about our latest Project – Mobile, by Peak Design. You've got just a couple hours left to get in there and back Kickstarter #10 to lock in a pretty burly discount on the whole thing. And it'll only cost a buck to reserve your spot.

updates.update_userinfo: Brilliant everyday carry, now for your phone.
updates.update_content:
Howdy Everyday Backpack, Tote, and Sling backers,
A mere 10 days ago, we launched a brand new product line on Kickstarter: Mobile, by Peak Design. And if you're not the type to get hyped-up by phone cases and accessories, well, we think that's about to change.

updates.update_userinfo: There's a new Everyday Line in town. Introducing v2.
updates.update_content:
Ahoy Everyday Backpack, Tote, and Sling backers,
Nearly 5 years ago, our head designer (Art Viger, great guy, you'd love him) sewed the very first Everyday Messenger bag prototype. We launched that bag on Kickstarter in 2015, and in 2016 we followed it up with the Everyday Backpack, Tote, and Sling. It became our biggest Kickstarter campaign ever (at the time), and the Everyday Backpack soon became our most popular, iconic product. Today, it's hard to spend a day walking around an airport or a big city without seeing an Everyday Backpack.

Howdy Everyday Line Backers,
Typically when we post updates to past campaigns, we're sharing the latest Peak Design creation available on Kickstarter. Well, this too is a note informing you of a Kickstarter that just launched. Only this time, it's much bigger than Peak Design.

Kickstarter #9 is live, folks.
Moments ago, we hit the launch button on a funding campaign for the most compact, pro-level travel tripod ever made. We call it—wait for it—Travel Tripod.

updates.update_userinfo: 2 new duffels, and hours to go.
updates.update_content:
Dearest Everyday Line backers,
With just hours left in our 8th Kickstarter campaign we're proud to announce 2 beautiful new duffel bags into our Travel Line: the Travel Duffel 35L and the Travel Duffelpack 65L. If you've backed other Peak Design campaigns you might be getting this note a few times, and for that we apologize. We just want to give all of our backers a final chance to be a part of this wild shindig.
Ladies and gentlemen, Kickstarter number 8 has launched. Introducing the Travel Line.

updates.update_userinfo: The 2018 Peak Design Survey is here, and we'll pay you to take it.
updates.update_content:
We'll keep this short and sweet: it's time for you to tell us how we're doing, what we can do better, and what we should make next. In return, we'll send every survey respondent a special 15% off code for use at peakdesign.com. Let's party.
TAKE THE 2018 PEAK DESIGN CUSTOMER SURVEY
A few important footnotes: this is not a boring corporate survey. We hate those. Secondly, this once-a-year survey isn't the only time we accept feedback. We're always listening to what our backers, customers, and dealers tell us through many channels. The point of this survey is to help us understand high level trends across a broad spectrum of our customers. Finally, we think you're neat. That's all.

Heyo!
For awhile it was looking like we would go an entire calendar year without launching a Kickstarter project. But, you know us. We just had to keep the streak alive.
Say hello to the new Capture, Slide, and Slide Lite!

Well, well, well! It's been some time. Lotta things happening over here at the PD HQ...things that will come to fruition before the year is out.
But first, whatcha been up to? As we decorate our porches with ornamental gourds this fall, we wanted to share what we've been doing since the last time we talked:

campaign.story:
Our Kickstarter campaign has ended. It's been an amazing journey and we are now manufacturing the first batch of The SilverAir Travel Underwear. To pre-order underwear, check out our website - https://www.yathletics.com
 Underwear rides up. Underwear smells. Sometimes, it gets hot and stuffy. Sometimes it loses shape. And when we’re going away for the week, we need to stuff half our bags with underwear. That’s just how it is. We wanted to change that.
Our goal is not to “pitch” you the product (that’s what our video is for!). Rather, we'll teach you something about it. We want you to really be able to see and experience the purposeful design and technology that went into creating these boxer briefs. Here are the highlights:
SMARTGRIP NO RIDE-UP SYSTEM
When we asked our backers what they disliked about their existing underwear, the most common feedback was that it rides and bunches up. So, we dug deep into the issue and discovered that the length of the legs and the elasticity of the fabric are contributing factors. Longer length holds better but when they ride up, there is more fabric that bunches up as well. So we adjusted the length to be just right and added spandex for superior elasticity. But we didn't stop there...
We created a brand new solution that we call SmartGrip. Inspired by grip systems in high-end cycling apparel, we called upon the best grip manufacturer and implemented cycling grips in our underwear. It worked, but the friction felt uncomfortable. After some more experimentation, we created our own custom grip system using soft silicones that you barely feel against your skin but which creates just enough resistance for the leg band to stay in place. The result is underwear that simply stays put.
SILVERAIR ANTI STINK TECHNOLOGY
This is our signature technology and we’ve incorporated it into the fabric of the underwear. It’s the same silver that you’ll find in our shirts and socks. Unlike most anti-odor solutions, ours is not a topical treatment. It's permanent and will never wash away. When it comes to anti-odor performance, this is the gold standard.
How does it work? The chemistry is simple. Sweat is mostly water and doesn’t have any smell. But the bacteria present in sweat often create unpleasant odors. Silver has the ability to break down bacteria and prevent them from reproducing, so the pure silver yarns permanently infused into our fabric helps to keep our underwear fresh and odor free.
PREMIUM MERINO FABRIC
Fabric is the heart of our products, and it’s what we spend most of our time on. Some of the best underwear we’ve worn is made from cotton, but cotton does not have any performance features. On the other hand, performance fibers like nylon and polyester tend to hold odor and can get uncomfortable after a few hours. We found the perfect solution in high end Merino Wool, which wicks moisture and can naturally regulate temperature.
Sourced from one of the best sheep farms in Australia, our Merino Wool is a 17.5 micron gauge - one of the finest in the industry. The use of ultra fine yarns allows us to create a fabric that's super soft. We also added spandex as underwear tends to lose their shape after being worn for half a day. The stretch fabric in this underwear not only holds its shape but it gives you increased flexibility for easier movement.
  We are Y Athletics, and our mission is to simplify your life with thoughtfully designed gear you can fall in love with. To do that, we engineer each product from scratch, with materials and components tailored specifically towards them. By focusing on every single detail, we are able to strike the perfect balance between performance, comfort, and style. We don't make too many products, but whatever we do make screams quality and craftsmanship.
3 years ago, we launched our first product through Kickstarter. The community here funded our dream and we delivered a 5 star product that is loved by thousands of people from around the globe. Last year, we did it again with our socks.
Another year and dozens of prototypes later, we’re back with our third and we couldn't have been more proud. We’re calling it The Ultimate Travel Underwear because it's going to change the way you travel. In reality, it's the best damn underwear for daily wear as well.
    UNDERWEAR
We are making the underwear in the boxer brief style in three colors:
Graphite Grey & Electric Blue are renderings
  Swatches of actual colors
 SHIRTS
Shirts will be available in your choice of crew or v neck in 3 colors: Charcoal Grey, Alloro Green & Glacier Silver. Additional color options from here may be added depending on availability.
SOCKS
Socks will be available in the ankle length in your choice of four colors: Jet Black, Glacier White, Ithaca Green, and Sedona Red.
UNDERWEAR
Our underwear will be manufactured in sizes S-XXL and will cover waist sizes 28" all the way to 46". The size guide will be available when we send out the surveys.
SHIRTS & SOCKS
Check out https://www.yathletics.com/pages/sizing
The underwear has been under development for more than a year. We've overcome most of the challenges and are ready to go into production. Below is an estimated timeline for production. You'll be the first to know if anything changes.
  GENERAL CAUTION
We offer the best deals to backers of our Kickstarter campaigns. Backers are also the first to receive new products and they get to see exciting progress of our production. The money you pledge towards our campaign goes directly into the development and production of our products. This campaign is not a store front. If you want full service from Y Athletics, please purchase products from yathletics.com at retail value when they're available.
REFUNDS
We reserve the right to issue or deny any requested refunds. If we issue a refund, we will deduct 10% from it because that amount has already been taken from your pledge as fees for the payment processor and Kickstarter.
EXCHANGES
We want you to be satisfied with your reward. If the product you receive does not fit, you may exchange the unworn items for a different size. We cannot exchange underwear and sock once the package is opened so we recommend trying one pair before opening the remaining ones. For exchanges, you’ll have to send the product back to us at your own expense and then pay for shipping the new product back to you.
INTERNATIONAL BACKERS
We ship internationally to select countries using FedEx and USPS. You will be given the choice to select your preferred carrier at the end of the campaign.
All international shipments are subject to duties, taxes and clearing fees which you are responsible for paying. All Kickstarter rewards will be declared 'gifts', however, most countries will assess duties/taxes and in certain countries the carrier will pre-pay the duties and taxes and bill you later. If you refuse delivery, your package will be abandoned. Once abandoned, we can’t ship another package to you or issue a refund.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is our fourth Kickstarter project. We’ve delivered some of the highest quality products to our backers in the past and this one’s not going to be any different. The only risk we can think of is the projected timeline of the delivery of rewards. Since this is a brand new development, there may be unforeseen challenges when we start production. If any issues come up, the delivery of your reward will be delayed.

That said, we’re pretty straight forward when it comes to communication and have built a reputation of being transparent with our backers. We'll make two promises:

1. We will deliver the highest quality product to each and every single backer. We take extreme pride in making some of the best products in the world and will never compromise on quality.

2. We will keep the lines of communication open at all times. If we have hurdles, you'll be the first to know about them.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hello Backers!

Our second production batch of the underwear is about to start. We just received the final samples of the all new boxer-brief with fly and wanted to share some pictures with you so you can see the design and the new color. We didn't get a chance to iron it so please excuse the creases.
If you'd like to grab these at a discounted price, we still have 5 hours left on our Sock 2.0 Kickstarter campaign where you can get them for $29/ea. (RP will be $38). Here's a link to the campaign page -

Hey Backers!
The results from the underwear survey are in and we are sharing it for you to see how we did. We received 460 responses which means the survey has a 95% confidence level with a less than 5% margin for error.
Let's begin...

Hey Backers!
Thanks so much for all the feedback you've given to us about your underwear! We welcome every single one of them. We're a small company with big dreams and your feedback really goes a long way in helping us do better.
We are surprised by the results from the survey (in a fantastic way!), so we are putting together a summary that we will share with you soon and we'll also tell you exactly what the future of our underwear line-up will look like.

Hey backers!

We sent a private message to all our backers yesterday with some updates. It turns out some of you got the message more than once (up to 4 times!).
I just wanted to let you know that this is happening due to a glitch in the Kickstarter messaging system and that we're not horrible people trying to spam you with the same messages.

Hey Backers!
After shipping more than 10,000 pairs of underwear last month, we're thrilled by the response we have received from you all. Thank you so much for believing in us and for providing us with valuable feedback.
During the Kickstarter campaign, some of you had asked for an all black underwear. We made those towards the end of production 001 and they're now up on our website. Here's a link -  [ in case you missed it, there was a $20 off $100 coupon in your package for any website purchase. The coupon code is LIVELIFE and it's valid until the end of March 2017 ]

Hello Everyone!

We haven't been able to ship out all the rewards this week unlike what we had predicted in last week's update. Here's the current status:

Hey guys, we want to give you a quick shipping update and also tell you about our Make/100 project.
SHIPPING UPDATE

campaign.story:
Your bed is covered in bacteria … Let’s change that.
Incredibly soft and beautifully designed, our sheets and pillowcases are engineered with some of the most advanced silver fibers in the world. These innovative fibers prevent the growth of unwanted bacteria – and will never wash away.
As Seen On: 
    Why are we laying our fresh faces onto a pillowcase that hasn’t been washed in days?
After just one night of use, your pillowcase and bed sheets can accumulate a horrifying array of bacteria, allergens and fungus. Dermatologists recommend washing your pillowcase every two or three days. But who has time for that?
The average adult washes their sheets every 2-3 weeks.
Studies suggest that some men change their sheets just four times a year and women, every two and a half weeks ... Sound about right? Our fabric is engineered to stay fresh, clean and comfortable night after night — regardless of how often you toss them in the washer.
 What makes Silvon special?
Antimicrobial Silver: By fusing innovative fibers with natural silver, our fabric is 99.9% effective in preventing bacterial growth on the fabric surface.
Completely Permanent: Similar products wash out or degrade in strength over time. However, because the silver is woven directly into our fabric, it will never wash away.
Incredibly Soft: We’ve paired our technology with Supima cotton grown right here in the USA. Supima cotton is among the softest, most durable cotton in the world.
All Natural – No Chemicals: Similar products use harsh chemical treatments to adhere silver particles to fabrics. We use the real thing – 99% pure natural silver.
Eco-Friendly: With Silvon we find new uses for the materials that naturally exist right in front of us. These advanced textiles also increase the time you can go between launderings. This helps save water and energy on a large scale.
Pure Natural Silver
Silver is naturally oligodynamic – simply put this means that it prevents the growth of bacteria. By fusing our fibers with natural silver, these antimicrobial properties are permanently ingrained in the fabric.
We couldn’t help but notice all the amazing qualities of natural silver. In fact, it made us wonder why such an incredible, natural resource had never been used in bedding before.
A New Category of Bedding
For ages, the fabric we rest on has remained unchanged. We think it’s time to change that.
We are constantly seeking new ways to use the world’s smartest natural materials. After years of research, we harnessed the incredible benefits of natural silver to create an innovative fabric that will, hopefully, create a whole new category of bedding.
The Science
Basically, silver carries a positive charge, and bacteria is negative (go figure). The silver is attracted to the bacteria, breaks its cell wall and the bacteria is destroyed before it has a chance to reproduce.
Advanced technology now allows us to weave silver coated fibers directly into our fabric. These silver fibers are proven to eliminate 99.9% of the bacteria on your entire pillowcase.
500% zoom
Does it work?
This technology has been verified by more than a decade of testing at research institutions including Pennsylvania State University and Cornell University. Silvon is tested in accordance with the highest antimicrobial standards (ASTM E2149). These lab tests have shown a 99.9% reduction in bacteria on the fabric. Furthermore, Our fabric is put through rigorous wash tests to ensure protection that will last the lifetime of the product.
Great. But comfy?
Advanced silver fibers and supple Supima cotton come together to create the perfect sleep surface.
A pillowcase isn’t much good if it’s not conducive to an amazing night’s sleep. That’s why we combined our technology with long-staple Supima cotton. One hundred percent of this cotton is grown in the US, and it’s among the most durable, softest cotton in the world.
How It’s Made
No harsh chemicals, no nanotechnology – those were our guidelines. We’ve partnered with a US-based antimicrobial tech company that uses natural silver to prevent bacterial growth on fabrics. Their proprietary process completely covers advanced fibers with silver while allowing them to remain extremely soft, flexible and comfortable.
Responsibility
Silvon is committed to manufacturing products that surpass the most stringent safety and environmental protection standards. All of our products are Oeko-Tex certified, which means that it supports human ecology through bio-compatibility and the absence of harmful substances in the manufacturing
Oh, and if you have a furry friend?
Your pet may be bringing more than love and warmth to your bed. Your four-legged friend is another source that enables bacteria, mold and allergens to grow.
Colors Options
Silvon is now available in two colors, Grey and White. You can select any reward, and at the end of the campaign we will contact all of our backers to confirm your color selection.
The Silvon Sheets
The Silvon Sheets are now available in both color options. You can select any size, and at the end of the campaign we will contact all of our backers to confirm your color selection. Each sheet set includes 1 fitted sheet, 1 flat sheet and 2 pillowcases.
Size Guide:
  Simplicity in design
We think less is more, which is why we don’t include unnecessary patterns or detailing. Instead, we designed the simplest, most comfortable fabric we could, using premium natural materials, without the premium price.
Details Make The Difference
From pillowcases with a tidy envelope closure to sheets with grippy elastic, all of our products incorporate thoughtful details with you in mind.
Care Instructions
Although our fabric helps keep bacteria from swarming your pillowcase, dust and other debris can sometimes accumulate. We recommend washing every 10-14 days with your normal laundry. Wash it on a cool or warm cycle, and tumble dry on low heat or hang to dry. Do not use chlorine bleach.
Advanced textiles can also be beneficial to the environment. Silvon will increase the time you go in between launderings, saving water and energy.
Why Us?
We don’t wear the same tee shirt for weeks on end – why do we lay onto a pillowcase that hasn’t been washed in days? This simple question became the beginning of an incredible journey to make a revolutionary fabric that would, hopefully, create a whole new category of bedding. 
Almost two years ago we launched our first product, SleepClean. It was an instant success. We had thousands of happy customers, and can be found in retail stores around the world.
But we constantly ask whether there is a better way. We wanted to create a solution that was completely permanent and avoid the use of any chemicals in our manufacturing process. We searched for new ways to use the world’s smartest natural materials. After years of researching, testing, and chasing this vision, we’ve harnessed the incredible benefits of natural silver to create a pillowcase and then bed sheets like no other.
Rewards:
Add-ons and Adjusting Your Pledge
If you would like to add additional products to your pledge, simply add the price of the additional product to your current pledge amount. If you would like to change your reward selection all together follow the steps below:
Stretch Goals
In 2 short weeks we have surpassed all of our stretch goals. We started with the Silvon Pillowcase, and now we're offering Silvon Sheets, Duvets, in 2 color options. Thank you!! 
Project Timeline
We manufacture with a group of experienced supply chain experts. Our partners helped make the production of our last product, SleepClean, a success. We're in safe hands, and confident of a timely delivery. We've built in buffers to account for any surprises, and all the development is complete.
May Kickstarter launch 
June Kickstarter complete – production begins! 
July Production completed – product ships to NYC 
August All Kickstarter rewards delivered!
Thank you – really.
There’s nothing more important than sleep. And it all starts with creating the right environment. We want to bring textile innovations to the bedroom – and believe that Silvon is a product that everyone can benefit from. We’re glad that you share this vision and we’re grateful to you for helping us bring this product to the world.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We’re a team of designers, engineers and operational experts. we understand what goes into making this product and we've done it in the past.

Our factory partners are ready to go. We have already produced a small sample run – and some of our lucky friends are already enjoying them.

Based on our past experience, we anticipate being able to fulfill orders within 6-8 weeks, but we should note that forecasting demand is an inexact science. If order volumes exceed our expectations, it might take slightly longer to fulfill orders.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Our latest inventory shipment just arrived in San Francisco. This inventory will allow us to fulfill any replacements and exchanges for those of you in need. We’re currently at our warehouse prepping for the inventory to speed up the shipping process as much as possible.

updates.update_content:
As we mentioned – we’ll be posting brief updates on shipping as we move through the process: 
It’s been a crazy couple of weeks at our fulfillment center. We’ve shipped over 6210 items to 2,424 backers around the globe. We were able to exceed our expectations and ship everything in our first batch of inventory in just under 10 days.
Our products are arriving in batches off the assembly line so we can get orders shipped as quickly as possible. We expect our next batch to arrive in the beginning of January. With this shipment we hope to fulfill all of our remaining backers.

We’re Shipping! It is with great excitement that we announce that shipping has begun! We’re incredibly proud of how far we’ve come – and we’re not slowing down. Our first batch of sheets and pillowcases arrived at the Silvon warehouse and we’re starting to ship orders right away.

campaign.story:
The Live Lite collection is made of the brand new proprietary fabric T2X. This natural fabric is made from 4 different fibres to create a high-stretch, ultra-lightweight solution engineered to keep you comfortable and cool. These fibres interact with each other in a way that promotes the various beneficial properties of each, while offsetting their individual weaknesses. The TENCEL®, content absorbs moisture away from the skin and into the fabric fibres is perfect for hot temperatures, and is also a natural bacteria repellant that prevents bacteria from rapid growth. This allows for the pants to be worn your entire trip without any accompanying smell. The polyester content creates durability and strength for high-movement adventures, while the cotton content allows for breathability, and creates a soft natural feel. Lastly, spandex is what gives the fabric it's amazing stretch providing ultimate comfort and maneuverability. All-in-all the best fabric for hot weather wear.
    Too hot for pants? We feel you! Whether you're outside on a summer day, or travelling somewhere warm, pants can be hot, sweaty, restrictive, and uncomfortable. Shorts sometimes work, but there are plenty of times when you need a little more coverage - whether that's to show up for a meeting, attend a wedding, or even hike through the bush. The “hot weather/travel pants” currently on the market are dorky, too informal, gimmicky, and made with synthetic materials that don't breathe well.
We developed the Live Lite pants specifically for travelling and hot weather wear, with a lightweight, breathable, anti-bacterial and high stretch fabric engineered to keep you comfortable and cool. We used this fabric to create various styles that put all other hot weather and travel pants to shame. By combining our years of experience in the fashion industry with our knowledge of technical fabrics, we've created pants that are both stylish and functional, with the added features you need while travelling. Pack less, travel light, Live Lite. You deserve better than zip-off pants.
                 The Live Lite pants keep you cool in hot weather and can be worn from business meetings to wilderness adventures, but there may be days where you can get more casual or show a little leg - but still want the same great fabric and design features. 
These shorts are made with the same T2X fabric as the Live Lite pants, plus many of the same travel features. You can receive the Journey Shorts with your current pledge by simply adding $50 to your current pledge (per pair of shorts) with no additional shipping fees. At a retail price of $89 this is a screaming deal only offered to our current Kickstarter backers. These shorts are only available as an Add On, not as a standalone pledge.
      Help us meet our goal of $50,000!  Once we do we will unlock the colour Storm Blue. We heard your comments from our last projects and our happy to offer a blue option, but only after we reach our goal, so get pledging!  
 Our backers voted on a new colour, and Woodlands was the winner!  All pant styles, men's and women's, will be available in this colour. The Journey Shorts will not be available in this colour. 
                                                                Dish and DUER is a start up filled with people who lead active lifestyles and recognize the need for clothing that can transition from work to play, and anything in between. We want to look and feel good, and know that our customers want the same. For these reasons we continue to innovate, design, and produce technical garments that meet the needs of active individuals.
We recognized that in addition to our current fabrics we needed a light-weight option that was appropriate for an urban setting during the warmer months. We loved the fibre make-up and performance of our No Sweat fabric, so we built on this foundation. We adjusted the composition and weaved the fibres in a different way to provide a high-stretch, lightweight solution. Once we saw the final fabric we realized that it was perfect for travel wear; comfortable, durable, and lightweight. By adding discreet features that provide convenience and security while travelling, we produced the Best Hot Weather Pants perfect for travel.
Our small company has grown because of the support of our Kickstarter backers, who helped us launch our Performance Stretch Denim in September 2014 and then our No Sweat fabric in October 2015. You asked for more, and we're thrilled to have Live Lite to offer exclusively to you.
  "I got my jeans today. These jeans feel so awesome unlike anything I've worn before. Really nice quality. I wish I gotten another pair in Black."
- Derrick on the Performance Stretch Denim 
"Ok received mine. I would back these guys again in a heartbeat - the material is exceptional, everything down to the packaging and labels, it's seriously perfect and can rival high-end retail. Very very happy with my product."
- Arth on the No Sweat Pant 
"Received my pants on Friday. This is the second Duer kickstarter campaign I have backed and once again they have crushed it. The pants are perfect and exactly what they promised they would be. I am a lifelong Duer supporter! Thank you for bringing great jeans/pants into the world" 
- Michael Bleier on the No Sweat Pant and Performance Stretch Denim
             SaveSaveSaveSaveSaveSaveSaveSaveSaveSaveSave

updates.update_content:
To our first DUER fans,
We have big news to share! We’ve drawn inspiration from the Kickstarter campaigns, and with a few adaptations, we’re excited to share the launch of NEXT by DUER! This is a quick response model that will enable you, our customers, to have early access to purchase new products or existing products in new fits, washes, and colours, at a discount. Each project will highlight a different product and you’ll have 3 weeks to pre-purchase. If we meet our minimum thresholds, which we expect to, your product will be manufactured and shipped to your door- all within 4-8 weeks. What’s equally as exciting is this new way of doing business will allow us to cut waste significantly because we’re only producing what’s been pre-ordered.

campaign.story:
HEXER DUSK
The Obsidian galaxy. Five years after the devastating Chaos War. The Sky Cities have fallen from the sky, other-dimensional creatures called the Weird have emerged from the rift caused by the Sky Cities destruction. The Weird can't survive here for long unless they take a being to use as their shell. Living or dead--it doesn't matter to them. Hexers are the only ones who can destroy the Weird--and most of them died in the Chaos War. Hexer Xane Dusk is one of the last Hexers. 
  Hexer Dusk is a gripping tale where dimensions collide, terrifying other-dimensional creatures invade and martial magic users called Hexers defend a galaxy on the edge of chaos.
 "My name is Xane Dusk. I'm one of the last Hexers. Time was, being a Hexer was an honorable thing. We protected, we served; we had a Code. That all changed the day the Sky Cities destroyed each other in the Chaos War. I was a soldier--I was there. I saw it happen. The destruction of the Cities burned a rift between dimensions--a big hole that let other-dimensional creatures through to Obsidian galaxy. We called them the Weird. They can't survive here long unless they find a body to inhabit. Lucky for them, they're good at grabbing up both the living and dead to use as their shells. Bad for us. Maybe now us Hexers finally have a true enemy to fight--if the Razers don't kill us all first. Sever taught me that what Hexers did was for the good of the galaxy. These days, I do what I must and my reasons are my own. My name is Xane Dusk. I'm one of the last Hexers."
HEXER DUSK

Most of my dreams are pretty mundane, but not the one that inspired Hexer Dusk.  It was one of those dreams that feels real-- like you are there. On an alien world, I watched as two sky cities began to light up--then explode--like suns going supernova. As the dying light washed over the landscape and the debris began to fall, I knew that everything I'd ever known had changed... 
The dream didn't stick around to tell me the rest, but the images haunted my daydreams. The bones of the world of Obsidia and rogue Hexer, Xane Dusk, evolved over the next couple of years--a post-apocalyptic galaxy of martial magic, monsters, alien species and grungy tech. 
Star Wars and Hawks
John Ostrander and I had a blast collaborating on Hawkman for DC and Star Wars stories at Dark Horse. We created Legacy, Cade Skywalker, Quinlan Vos, Aayla Secura, the Imperial Knights and a legion of other characters. None of these characters belonged to us, but we gave them our hearts and souls anyway because we were doing what we love to do!
The Hexer Dusk Team
John and I have a dynamic collaboration process. We weave our ideas together and the end result always gets me excited to draw the story. We'd often talked about doing something creator owned, so it seemed like a given that we could bring the kind of energy and teamwork we'd brought to other projects to Hexer Dusk. I told John about the story and he agreed that it was perfect for the Indy project we'd always wanted to do.
Those of you who know John's and my work, know that we're passionate about art and story--and about creating characters, creatures and worlds for them to inhabit. For me, Hexer Dusk is the amalgam of everything I love to draw and imagine. For both John and me, it's a new far away galaxy to explore. 
I hope you will take a look at this Kickstarter--and if you like what you see--if you're curious to see more, stay a while and explore this new galaxy with us. This is the first Hexer Dusk story--but we have a lot more stories we want to tell-- who am I kidding-- that we need to tell!
--Jan Duursema 
The Fall of the Sky Cities. That’s what grabbed me. The image, the idea, of two great cities at war, with high towers, massive and incongruously floating above the planet, exploding and falling in mutual destruction. I could see them. I could hear them – a terrible noise. I could almost smell it. That’s what grabbed me when Jan told me about the idea she had for Hexer Dusk. 
That’s what you look for when you’re starting a project – something that excites your imagination, that makes you ask questions, to want to know more, to know what it means. To know what the story is. With the images came words, all evocative: Obsidian. Scavvers. The Weird. Skargle and The Missus. Kombot. Hexer Dusk. That’s how a story is grown. Those are the seeds. That’s how it starts. An idea, an image that comes from within you and that you need to incarnate. To make physical. To make real. And it’s already begun.
--John Ostrander
HEXER DUSK WILL BE A FULL COLOR 72 PAGE GRAPHIC NOVEL!
        PAGE 8
 PAGE 9
    HEXER XANE DUSK
  HEXERS gain new tattoos as they master new hexes.
          KOMbot MECH AKA "KOMBOT" Don't let Kombot's friendly grin fool you. This mech has what it takes to fight the Weird.
  Calyx is a Obsidian Masq and Hexer. Native to the planet Obsidia, Calyx is a rare combination of Obsidian and Masquer.
  SKULBAT'S are found everywhere in the Obsidian Galaxy. Xane Dusk's ship is named after these scavenger creatures.
  THE MISSUS is a powerhouse. Her species is naturally radioactive.
  Never let a Rag Baby see you.
 STRETCH GOALS!
STRETCH GOAL #1 IS UNLOCKED! 19K Diecut Skulbat sticker included in rewards $15 and up!
STRETCH GOAL #2 IS UNLOCKED! 21K Die cut KOMBOT sticker included in rewards $15 and up!
STRETCH GOAL #3 IS UNLOCKED! 26K B&W DIGITAL UNWRAPPED PDF included in all rewards $10 and up.
STRETCH GOAL # 4 IS UNLOCKED--BONUS 6 PAGE STORY included in rewards $10 and up
STRETCH GOAL #5 37K LOCKED SKULBAT PATCH included in rewards $20 and up
STRETCH GOAL #6 45K LOCKED PRINT VERSION B&W UNWRAPPED HEXER DUSK added to rewards $20 and up
STRETCH GOAL #7 50K LOCKED 12 page BONUS STORY added to rewards $10 and up 
HEXER DUSK will be a 72 page FULL COLOR  trade paperback graphic novel which will include pre-production 'making of' sketches for this new series. The cover will be 14 pt cover stock with 85 lb text full-color interior. Reward tiers $25 and up will have a signed and numbered bookplate. The writing is done and 13 pages of art are penciled and inked. If we open up some stretch goals, we could even add another short story to the TPB!
WHY GO INDY?
We've worked on comic series for major comic book publishers and licensed franchises our entire careers. It's been a heck of a great ride and we'd both love to do more of that in the future! It's a certainty that Hexer Dusk could not have happened without the experience we gained working in mainstream comics. But at the end of that journey, the characters we created for others companies and the stories we told don't belong to us. We knew going in that we don't control their fates, but...
With Hexer Dusk, we want to create a story that we can do more than just be a  part of. We have a distinct vision of the world of Obsidia and the characters we are creating for it. We want to shape that story into reality the way we see it. Doing Hexer Dusk as an Indy project through Kickstarter give us the opportunity to do that!
Thanks for coming by and taking a look at our Kickstarter! We hope you will back Hexer Dusk and enjoy reading the first book of what we dream will become a series! 
 How do Add-Ons Work?
Once you're a backer for a shipped reward level $20 and up, you can add on to your order like this:
--Add up the total of your Add-Ons
--Click the blue 'Manage' Button in the upper right hand corner.
--Add the total of your Add-On's to your pledge amount.
--You don't need to change the tier you've already selected.
--That's it! After the campaign ends, we'll send you a survey and you will be able to easily select the Add-Ons you wanted.
  Why is postage separate and not included in the reward?  Keeping track of the reward tiers can get confusing--especially when offering shipping to anywhere in the world. Keeping the postage separate simplifies the levels, ensuring that everyone receives the reward they pledged!
We will also be able to offer no extra shipping for Add-Ons for packages under 4 libs--so you will be able to order an ADD-ON copy for Hexer Dusk for a friend with no extra shipping!
WHERE DOES THE FUNDING GO?
Publishing a book like Hexer Dusk isn't cheap. You have to factor in the cost of printing, postage, manufacturing rewards and Kickstarter fees, packing supplies...etc. Hexer Dusk will be in full color, so we need to hire a colorist and a letterer--as well as make sure the creators can keep the lights on while producing the the art and writing!  If we exceed our goal? First we'll dance like mad Skulbats... then we'd create MORE Hexer Dusk stories! Ultimately, we hope to make this first TPB into a series of sci-fi adventures in the Obsidian Galaxy.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Every project has the potential to be delayed. Sometimes life sends along delays just to remind us we're puny humans (and sometimes Coyote just enjoys a good laugh.) The story for Hexer Dusk is written, 13 pages of art are penciled and inked, so we've already got a great start on the project's production. Professionally, we take our craft seriously and both of us have good people on board to help us along the way. Hexer Dusk is a project we need to make happen. Even the Weird can't stop us.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Ably’s 100% premium cotton shirts and hoodies shrug off water, stains, and odor so you can get into your dirtiest fun and still look and smell fresh. Go ahead, Nature Boy—camp for a week with only one shirt. Go for it, Gym Queen—work out for an hour on the elliptical and still smell like daisies. It’s time to think of all the stuff you can do with your time besides laundry.
Ably Apparel is activated with Filium™, a technology that makes natural fabrics repel liquids, stains, and odors. The first time we saw our prototypes in action, we had to pick our jaws off the floor. Pour water on an Ably shirt, spill coffee or wine, and it just beads up and rolls off like it’s on glass.
Unlike most performance apparel, ABLY clothing doesn’t absorb sweat. Your perspiration just evaporates through the breathable fabric, keeping your clothes fresh. You can wear our shirts to the gym every day for a week and it’ll still smell new. It’s not 100% waterproof, so if you get dunked you’ll still get wet—but your Ably shirt or hoodie will dry up to 40% faster than regular cotton. There are other products on the market now that promise similar repellant properties, but they use a nanoparticle coating. Our technology doesn’t use nanoparticles or toxic chemicals that can leach into your skin or the environment. Filium’s core technology is produced according to bluesign® standards for sustainable materials and production.
                                                     These are prototypes. We’re still messing with some of the details and looking for new features to add, so the final product may be a little different. We’ll let you know about any changes, and If you have any suggestions or requests we’d love to hear them.
We think this product is amazing even if it’s just one incredible shirt or hoodie in your wardrobe. (Or five. Or ten. Don’t let us hold you back.) Doing laundry uses a lot of energy and resources. Washing and drying one load of laundry every two days creates about 970 lbs of CO2 every year. Even if you don’t do laundry that often, multiply that energy cost by all the hundreds of millions of people who wash clothes. Which is most people, by the way. If even a fraction of the world’s clothing were activated with Filium, that would be a gigantic reduction in carbon emissions and wasted resources.
We don’t have a whole line of Ably clothing ready to go, but we want to prove that this idea works. If we can do that, then more clothing manufacturers will adopt Filium. And when that happens, this becomes so much more than just a cool shirt or hoodie. We don’t want Ably to be the only clothing line activated with Filium, we just want it to be the first. And that’s where you come in. Help us out with a pledge, get some Ably gear, and spread the world. And that’s where you come in. Help us out with a pledge, get some Ably gear, and spread the word.
      1st Stretch Goal Complete...Women long sleeve shirts will be available as an add-on at the end of the campaign.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The extraordinary properties of Ably are recent developments, but as far as creating and delivering great fitting premium apparel, this is not our first rodeo. Our track record in the apparel industry makes us completely confident we will be able to timely fulfill any number of orders.

campaign.story:
The world's most comfortable, versatile and technologically advanced underwear. Fighting bacteria, regulating temperatures and reducing sweat.
We've taken the data and input from our last successful Kickstarter and created a line of basics for the busy modern man. A line of basics that will stay fresh after a long day at the office or a quick session in the gym, never having to worry about smelling bad or nasty bacteria. 
The Products
Socks
We've been working with our sock manufacturer for almost a year now. We've made and tested dozens of prototypes and feel confident in bringing them to you. The socks you see in pictures are ready for production and we'll start manufacturing them as soon as we are able to raise the funds for production.
Boxer briefs
Our manufacturer out of Izmir Turkey, was the first textile company in Turkey to be organic. They put great pride in working with organic materials and have an inspiring mindset for sustainability. When we first talked to them about our idea they didn’t think it was possible to bring such a complicated and expensive technology only used in space suits and military performance clothing to the greater consumer. At the end, we convinced them to believe in our vision. 1 year after we stand together with a product so great no one thought was possible to create. Help us reach our goal by backing this campaign.
T-Shirts
Built for performance, this T-shirt will stay fresh and odorless all day. Silver fibers are permanently infused into our fabric, which keeps your shirts fresh all day for the entire lifetime of the t-shirt. The silver fiber does this by fighting the odor-causing bacteria. We’ve engineered a t-shirt fabric by knitting organic long fiber cotton with our SilverTech Performance Silver, and added a nip of elastane to give it the perfect fit and stretch. The result is a shirt that is so soft, smooth and light that it will almost feel like your second skin – naturally keeping your body dry and acclimatised.
Why Silver?
Pure silver is a metal that can naturally be extracted from mother earth. There are no artificial chemicals in our 99.99% pure silver, and it is ofcourse nontoxic. Of all metals known to mankind, silver is known for being the most efficient reflector as well as the best electrical-,and thermal conductor. But most importantly silver is known for its oligodynamic effect; a biocidal effect that controls microbial growth and kills bacteria with silver ions. 
This is why silver can be found in many places in human history as a bacteria killer. Silverware is a great example of self-sanitizing cutlery, in the same way as silver water bottles carried by military commanders on expeditions for protection against diseases. Lately innovation has brought the natural pure silver fibers into new use; from bandages to toilet seats. Historically seen, silver has thus always had a professional relation to the human body, and now Organic Basics want to bring the super fiber to your closet. 
Skin protecting smart wear
With SilverTech we have created a cutting edge smart fabric. A line of basics produced in the latest performance fabrics that work as an extra natural dimension to your skin. Through science fiction movies and super hero-comic books, we have seen people dressed up in bodysuits with super human capabilities that naturally work with their bodies. Now Organic Basics is taking the first step in that direction by developing the of future underwear.
By working with natural elements such as pure silver and organic cotton, we've created a fabric that enhances the capabilities of your skin; keeping you warm when it’s cold and cooling you down when it’s warm. At the same time helping your body control micro bacterial growth and kill the unwanted bacteria. With this line of basics we've focused on the three most important pieces of underwear that will help stay warm, clean and odorless.
Responsible Innovation
In Organic Basics, sustainability is a core value and something we focus on in every aspect of our work - from production to packaging to end-consumer use. This is also why we, in our textile production, only use GOTS and Oeko-tex 100 certified organic cotton, certified pure silver, and WRAP certified labor.
For packaging we only use reused and sustainable materials. In our choice of clothing there are two mayor factors to consider when looking at sustainability. Firstly, the longevity of the product is essential to the sustainability of the clothing; will it last one year or ten years? Secondly we need to consider the water consumption due to washing. Is it something you need to wash everyday or twice a week? With SilverTech we have been working with pure silver and long fiber organic cotton creating a high quality fabric made to last +10 years and with active silver controlling microbial growth potentially bringing down machine washes by 50 percent. Goodbye to fast fashion and goodbye to planned obsolescence.
The story of Organic Basics
Organic Basics was born on Kickstarter with the help and support of hundreds of backers from over 35 countries. Backers who believed in our dream to change the underwear industry. A lot of you backers are still loyal customers and backing our dream.  
PLAY

Our dream is to develop and create products that are always challenging the technology and at the same time always minimizing the impact our production and products have on the environment.  
1.5 year ago we launched our company Organic Basics – Organic underwear and socks –and our awesome backers raised more than $20.000 to kickstart our dream. We’ve been working hard to develop our company, and are now ready to introduce what we’ve spent many months and hundreds of hours on developing. We are proud to introduce the SilverTech line – It’s elegant. It’s comfortable. It’s odorless. It’s the future of underwear. 
Development
The FLEXSIL Performance Silver is a brand new performance fabric. We sourced the finest long fiber organic cotton from our supplier in Turkey, known for its natural durability and consistent high quality. We added a nip of elastane for stretch recoverability. Finally, we blended our FLEXSIL Performance silver which is spun from pure silver and polyester with our fine organic cotton on the areas that accumulate the most heat and thereby sweat, which takes the odor-fighting capability of this fabric to a whole new level, unlike anything you have ever experienced. Our method with FLEXSIL spun directly into the product, the silver effects will last the lifetime of the product. We have actively chosen NOT to work with silver nanoparticles that will wash out after just a few washes. 
PLAY

We have worked intensely with our designers and construction specialist from Turkey, and from there we iterated until it was just right. We used seamless knitting to create a sock without any stitches and added vent zones that allow airflow to keep your feet cool and comfortable. This is elegant yet highly functional. After you've worn it a few times, you won’t be able to go back to anything else.
Testing and improvement
We've been testing our prototypes rigorously over the last 9 months. From the first prototypes we’ve been testing for everything from heat-transfer capabilities to odor-fighting powers to hard washing and drying. It wasn’t perfect when we started, but after 9 month of improvement and constant optimization we can finally present a product worth the future generations.
The Production
This is where YOU come in. We're still a young brand that is completely self-funded, and to bring the SilverTech to market, we need to manufacture them at a moderate scale. Help us fund our first production batch of the SilverTech Underwear and be the first to try out the next generation of underwear. We depend on you, and we need you to help us build a greener future for underwear.
Find your size
Delivery schedule
Help us spread the word
We started this journey here on Kickstarter, and we want to keep travelling with our awesome backers and the Organic Basics community. We need your help to get the word out, so whether you’re talking to friends or family or sharing it on facebook every help is humbly appreciated.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Organic Basics is a professional business. Quality products and happy customers is what we do. We are not perfect but we never stop until we get it right. 

This is our second Kickstarter project. We have always delivered and have always been transparent with our backers about our progress and challenges. At our last campaign we delivered within the timeframe which was two months after the campaign finished. From experience, we know that the biggest risk is fulfilling delivery times.

With our experience we have together with our production team done our best to create a realistic projections of the time necessary to manufacture and deliver rewards Complications can arise while manufacturing at such a high standard. Our focus is like our last campaign on two areas. 

1. QUALITY - We will deliver the highest quality product to every backer. We take extreme pride in making some of the best products in the world and will never compromise on quality.

2. COMMUNICATION - We will keep the lines of communication open at all times. If any issues arise, you'll be the first to know about them. We encourage you to take a look at our communication with backers from our previous Kickstarter project: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/488013677/organic-basics/comments
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Last batch being sent from Denmark
updates.update_content:
For the last few backers still waiting for their items to be shipped
As most of you are well aware, we have had big issues with our chosen distribution company, and last week we decided to finally terminate the partnership.
It has been an extremely frustrating process filled with delays, unkept promises and violated deadlines from their side.
We have learned a lot from this experience, and will make sure to not make the same mistakes again. Our biggest mistake was, that we wanted to secure you the cheapest possible shipping options, thus choosing our distribution partner on the basis of cost, instead of ability to execute and in the end deliver SilverTech to you guys within an acceptable time frame.

A Marathon, not a sprint
Doing a Kickstarter campaign is not a sprint, it's a marathon, and things that can go wrong most likely will go wrong. In this campaign, we learned that the hard way.
Before we launched this campaign, we felt very secure that we had everything under control, we had some great samples from our trusted supplier, we had a great partnership with Backerkit and we were recommended to work with a supposedly experienced fulfillment company responsible for handling and sending out all of our orders to meet our backers expectations.

First of all a big thank you is in order. Your backing and support has financed a vision to create a superior line of basic clothing, that helps pushing towards higher standards when it comes to sustainable production and consumption in the textile industry.
Your feedback, both on the product side and on the execution of the crowdfunding campaign is so helpful to us. It has been overwhelming to experience such genuine interest, understanding and helpfulness. Such actions from your side, is completely crucial for us on our journey towards creating the world’s best underwear and to our future presence on Kickstarter.

We’re closing in!
All Danish, German and Belgian customers should have received their SilverTech by now. Thank you so much for all the positive feedback and the pictures you have shared - it means the world to us.
Should any Danish, German or Belgian customers not have received their SilverTech yet, please send and e-mail to and we will help you out within 48 hours!

campaign.story:
Our Kickstarter campaign has ended but you can still get yours from our website.
Smoovie is a video stabiliser that fits in your pocket, is easy to use for all abilities and the most affordable option for recording smooth video on the go!
Our revolutionary design means Smoovie is significantly lighter and more compact than other video stabilisers. We’re excited because professional looking video is now simple, compact and affordable enough for everyone!
Take it anywhere and everywhere, and when inspiration strikes you'll have it to record great video to keep and share forever. Use Smoovie at home, on the go or on your next adventure!
Here's how using Smoovie compares to handheld.
Traditional video stabilisers are much bigger and heavier, with tricky and time consuming set up. Instead of relying on weight and friction Smoovie cleverly uses magnetic force, allowing anyone to record smooth video without all that bulk.
PLAY

Be more creative with you video! Here's what we shot in a day in London. (No post stabilisation)  
We've made Smoovie really simple easy to set up. Just pull out the telescopic counterweight balance to the marker for your smartphone or GoPro, and Smoovie calibrates itself! Aaand action!
Be more creative with your shots! The handle is adjustable so you can get the shots you want. Get up high or go down low!
Plus with a more natural handgrip there's no more holding your smartphone at odd angles so no more wrist ache!
The patent-pending gimbal design uses two lightweight but super strong neodymium magnets. This magnetic attraction is what keeps shots steady by reducing the shaking created when you walk or move. Go where you like and record fantastic looking smooth videos!
Compact size 19cm x 4cm x 3.5cm (and extends up to 11cm).

Weight 125 grams (4.4 oz), that's less than a Big Mac!
Holds All popular Apple, Android and Windows smartphones up to 86mm in width and 225 grams in weight. Plus all GoPro models with Smoovie Plus.
Materials Two strong neodymium N42 magnets, durable ABS and acetal plastic body, protective TPE rubber pads and long-lasting stainless steel telescopic tubes.
It's not quite as good as the large, heavy and expensive equipment that professionals use. But we're excited about Smoovie because it's affordable, easy for everyone and can be taken everywhere. When inspiration strikes, you'll have it! 
For GoPro users you can capture all of the action with Smoovie Plus. With the Smoovie Plus option you'll get Smoovie for smartphones with an additional interchangeable adapter to use with your GoPro tripod mount.
Back us today and help us go into production. Not only will you get yours by June but to say thanks you'll get Smoovie and Smoovie Plus at the lowest special Kickstarter prices. 
Estimated RRP is £19.99 for Smoovie and £21.99 for Smoovie Plus. 
After five months of development and four rounds of rapid prototyping using 3d printing, machining and duplication techniques, our design has been tested in different scenarios and we’re really pleased with the outcome. Currently the design is going through a final iteration to refine the aesthetics so that Smoovie looks and feels great too. 
In January this year Alex travelled to China to discuss the manufacture of the Smoovie project with factories the team had long term relationships with already. After comparing the quality of prototypes produced and manufacturing processes, a selection was made.
We are confident that the manufacturer we have chosen is best suited to help us get Smoovie ready for mass production so that we can deliver a product that satisfies our requirements and more importantly that you'll be happy with.
We are an experienced team based in London and HK who have designed, developed and delivered products  on a global scale. We know how to bring innovative ideas to life and take them to market. 
Our product designer Alex Kalogroulis has worked on many innovational designs. In his early years he worked alongside British Inventor Sir Clive Sinclair on the award-winning A-Bike which is displayed in London’s Design Museum. Alex has also led design on other products like Sea Scooters and Smart Touch kitchen gadgets. He also teaches future designers on the Innovation Design Engineering master’s course at London’s Royal College of Art. 
We're so excited to see what you'll do with Smoovie. Let's keep in touch, join us on Twitter and Facebook. 
Your contribution matters so so much. We can only make this happen with your help. If we don't reach our goal we won't be able to go into production. Please help us share Smoovie with your friends so that we can make Smoovie together!
                                        If you like us and want to share about Smoovie here's our press kit. We like you too!
Need anything else or just want to chat? Please email alex@pocketsmoovie.com
This project is promoted by Jellop, a direct­ response online advertising agency specializing in Kickstarter campaigns on Facebook Ads and Google AdWords.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
With years of experience our team really understand industrial design, working with manufacturers to get it right and delivering product all over the world.

We've already spent a lot of time prototyping, testing and refining Smoovie to get it right for you. Working closely with our manufacturer to continuously learn and improve from prototype to production our aim is to work quickly with them so that you get your Smoovie on time. 

We've been conservative with our timeline and accounted for short delays that may arise. As with all products being mass produced for the first time we know that sometimes unforeseen scenarios can occur. Should this happen we promise our backers that we will do everything and work hard to deliver on spec and as quickly as possible.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Smoovie will be with you soon!
updates.update_content:
Production is complete and we’re currently packing the final Smoovies before sending to our fulfilment centre this week. From there Smoovie orders will then be shipped all over the world in batches. To find out when you can expect yours here are our estimated arrival dates for Smoovie:
China 1-3 August 
Hong Kong 4-6 August
US + Canada 11-13 August
EU 12-15 August
ROW 16-18 August

We're excited to let you know our product designer Alex has arrived back from a successful trip to the factory. Here’s a little update from him on how well his visit went!
“Pilot production had been completed ready for my arrival and I personally checked all units for defects. Any issues were addressed by a very cooperative manufacturing team and the pilot production repeated and improved until units passed a strict quality control standard. This process was completed within 48 hours before we gave the green light for production to go ahead.”

Today we have shared our survey with all our amazing backers. Please share your details with us and we'll work on shipping them out to you safely and as quickly as possible.

campaign.story:
THE ODOR FREE GYM TEE
Conception
Buffer was conceived when three fitness fanatics were chatting post-workout about how the fitness clothing industry just wasn't meeting our needs. Our phones, watches, and other gadgets are all updated with the latest technology, so why weren't we given smarter clothing options as well?
The Problem
Big active-wear brands offer a ridiculous amount of options, which all have the same problem. They stink. Literally. After a long workout, pickup game, or run, the shirts smell terrible! Even after multiple washes, these odors can remain for the lifetime of the garment.
Normal Shirts Stink!
Our Solution
We decided to create Buffer, a brand that delivers only the highest quality functional performance apparel. 
In order to do this we were laser focused in three key areas: Functionality. Quality. Design.
After months of hard work designing, sourcing the highest quality fabric, and identifying the best manufacturer for our goals. In the process, we identified technology used in hospitals that could be applied to fabric and create an odor free, antimicrobial gym tee. We then created the most advanced fitness shirt available: Buffer
 Buffer Is:
Odor Resistant: Copper ions are permanently infused in our nylon/spandex fabric creating a 99% antimicrobial shirt.
Quick Dry/Moisture Wicking: Our fabric is knit so that sweat and moisture is pulled from the inside and brought to the outside, so it can evaporate as fast as possible. 
Comfort Fit: We've designed the shirt to rest closely to your body, allowing our fabric's 4-way stretch to give you full range of motion for any activity.
Flatlock Seams: The shoulder and side seams are stitched together with no seam allowance, meaning they rest flat on the body, without extra fabric, giving you a comfortable chafe-free wear.
How Our Odor Free Fabric Works
Copper nanoparticles are permanently bonded to our nylon/spandex fabric through electroplating, which causes the fabric to be 99% antimicrobial. Copper attacks microbes in a three step process.
1. Air combined with moisture causes the copper in your shirt to oxidize, which releases copper ions (No, your shirt won't turn green like your old pennies).
2. The copper ions directly interact with the outer surface of the microbe's bacterial membrane, which causes the membrane to rupture.
3. Once the bacterial membrane ruptures, the cell loses vital nutrients and water, which causes the microbe to weaken. This thwarts the ability for the bacteria to mutate and reproduce, thus leaving the shirt 99% microbe-free.
Our Quality Tests
We've gone as far as ENSURING they are as odor free as can be. No other company is as transparent with this.
Here's Our Tests/Results
Odor Resistance Test
Bacteria-Free Test
Size Chart
Rewards
Stretch Goals

                         Follow us on Facebook!
CLICK to check out FIT STYLE Fashion Meal Bags!

campaign.story:
The CONNEX™-cable, is a smart cable that improves on the design of existing cables, being shorter (which prevents tangles), but not so short as to make it difficult to use. Thanks to the Silicone's elasticity and physical strength, it can stretch and gives you a great deal of flexibility to connect devices at a distance and awkward uneven port level, and immediately returns to its original form!
The CONNEX™-cable is the most creative universal cable providing an easy compact tangle-free solution that users can personalize.
                                     A CARD-SHAPED SELF-COLLAPSIBLE DATA CABLE : Eliminate Clunky, Annoying Cords for Good!
It's broadly agreed nearly every cable for smart devices leaves a great deal to be desired. Most are too long, which leads to tangles and other headaches while others are simply too short. Our CONNEX™-cable boldly responds to this problem with the size of a credit card and effortlessly connects your digital devices for transferring data and charging. This new solution will eliminate the current annoyances of your tangling and bulky wire cables and those extra short length cables.
Data Transfer (Phone, Tablet, Camera, Speaker, Navigation Device, Laptop, Mac, PC, etc.) 
Device Charging (Phone, Tablet, Camera, Power Bank, Speaker, etc) 
Mitigating Hassles (Tangles, Irritations, Frustrations, and so on)
Traditional charging and data cables are about 3 feet 5 inches (3'5"), which can cause you inconveniences that are just unnecessary. A cable of this length is prone to easy tangling with other cables like your earphones and peripheral’s cords. This can cause one big tangling mess!
Thanks to the Ultra-Durable Silicone's elasticity and physical strength, the cable immediately returns to its original form!
We offer both an Apple Lightning Connector version for all Apple product connectivity; iMac, MacBook, iPhone, iPad, iPod AND a Micro USB connector version for most Android devices and PC.
The CONNEX™-cable is the most creative universal cable providing an easy compact tangle-free solution that you can personalize. You can draw and put other forms of art on the cable. It's a great fun way to express yourself! Enhance with a logo or your own design! It is a fun way to have it filled with doodle, sketches and other flights of ink-filled fancy.
There is a wide array of colors to suit your preferences and match all of your devices. This is ultimate convenience with style.
Each product will be individually packaged for the proper protection.
No more worries about tangling cables! Its slim and small form-factor will fit in the smallest of places nicely like your wallet, trouser pocket, and anywhere else you want to carry it around in. It is a truly small and nifty!
It Fits!
It hangs!
  ...and it even holds your place in a book!
It Stretches!    
It can stretch for your convenience and gives you a great deal of flexibility to connect devices within 18 inches, at any angle and even those awkward uneven surfaces. This product works with you, not against you!
It Connects!   
This cable is all about the connectivity between digital devices with USB-A and Micro USB OR USB-A and Lightning Connector.
Amazing Experience 
Sometimes, conventional cables are too long and inconvenient to use on the move, where as some short length cables are just that little bit too short! This leaves you stuck on the middle with no real solution! Most stick type short length charging cables require extra effort to get an equal port level, facing angle and so on. With the CONNEX™-cable, you won’t experience these common issues for much longer – Easy use and no tangling gives you a much greater experience. This is a truly simple solution to an irritating problem most of us face each day!
Most stick type (a.k.a Key chain) short length charging cables are limited to connecting devices at a distance and uneven port levels OR to charge devices from the wall outlet.
Thoughtful Design 
This cable was not only designed small and slim, but also performs the best for great stretch and complete collapse. Through our series of studies, we found a unique cutting pattern that gives us the best result for performance. We designed it with complete space efficiency in mind. The space for the cable and connector over mold has been precisely allocated for the entire volume to mitigate the total area.

Along with its elasticity and physical strength, our design solution also helps it to prevent rips and tears.
Superb Material
CONNEX™-cable is made of Ultra-Durable Synthetic Silicone for great stretch and perfect collapse. Flexible to your every need!
Silicone exhibits many useful characteristics, including: 
High tensile strength 
Low thermal conductivity 
Low chemical reactivity 
Low toxicity Thermal stability (constancy of properties over a wide temperature range of −100 to 250 °C). 
The ability to repel water 
Does not stick to many substrates, but adheres very well to others, e.g. glass. 
Does not support microbiological growth. 
Electrical insulation properties. Because silicone can be formulated to be electrically insulative or conductive, it is suitable for a wide range of electrical applications. 
[SOURCE from: Hans-Heinrich Moretto, Manfred Schulze, Gebhard Wagner (2005) "Silicones" in Ullmann's Encyclopedia of Industrial Chemistry, Wiley-VCH, Weinheim.]  
Tech Spec  
Weight: 15g(Product) / 55g+/-(Packaged weight) 
Dimension: 86mm(3.4inch) X 54mm(2.1inch) X 3.5mm(0.14inch) 
Cable Length: 18inch(Recommended) / 20inch(Max) 
Materials of Cable: Ultra-Durable Synthetic Silicone 
Package Condition: Individually Packaged within Clear PET Blister for Maximum Visibility
* If one of the tiers doesn't fit your needs, we're happy to customize your orders of 20 or more. Please contact us at info@mobileaccessoryproject.com
Our goal is to ensure that the entire production line set up is completed by mid-June 2016. By the end of June 2016, we want to be in full production, and if everything is in order, we will immediately dispatch the CONNEX™-cable to our backers! We want to get this out to you as soon as possible, so that you can begin experiencing the benefits!  
All level pledges will help us set up the initial production run. The budget includes the product development cost; tooling, raw material prep, and all other necessary expenses including supplier visits, shipping & handling and so on. We will allocate our resources effectively to meet and complete the necessary goals on time. We want to serve you as soon as possible, with the highest of quality at all times.

We are so grateful to everyone who has taken the time to read our campaign and for those who contributed what they could to make a difference and in helping us to spread the word. This has created a huge impact that will result in our ability to serve the world with better products for convenience. We have spent the last few months working hard to bring our vision to life and it has been worth every minute, thanks to all our generous supporters. Please know your efforts, even the smallest, haven’t gone unnoticed. We will continue to keep you posted on what your pledge helped us to achieve. You are part of our journey.
If you cannot pledge but you are interested in helping, please contact us so we can set you up with a referral program! You may even be able to earn a FREE 7 inch Stainless Steel Ball-Chain just by spreading the word!
