campaign.story:
Why explore Yellowstone Lake?
Yellowstone started a proud tradition of protecting our planet’s most unique environments when it became the world’s first National Park more than a century ago. However, there is a part of Yellowstone that very few people have visited. An entire ecosystem that is hidden from us at the surface. A place that scientists are eager to study and may harbor unknown life; the depths of Yellowstone Lake.
We now know that the bottom of the Lake is far from barren, hosting species of crustaceans, sponges, and even small creatures that feed off of the Earth’s heat and chemistry rather than the Sun. ‘Thermophilic’ (or hot water-loving) microbes thrive in the relatively high-temperatures immediately surrounding active thermal features at the bottom of the Lake and scattered throughout Yellowstone Park. These creatures may be microscopic but they have the potential to profoundly influence the medical and biological sciences.
An artist's visualization of the new Yellowstone robot "Yogi" sampling a thermal feature at the bottom of the Lake. Artwork by Michelle Anderst.
The study of one particular microbial species found in the backcountry of the Park in the 1970’s, Thermus aquaticus (Taq), led to the development of the Nobel prize-winning method used to decode DNA and opened the floodgates to modern molecular biology. Researchers believe that because these organisms live in temperatures comparable to those inside the human body, analysis of their metabolic and physiological processes could to lead us to more effective treatments for cancer and other devastating human diseases. NASA scientists have also suggested that these thermal environments, and the unique lifeforms they support, might hold clues to the origin of life on this planet and possibly elsewhere in the universe.
It is estimated that less than 1% of Yellowstone's microbes have been identified so far and it’s hard to predict what might be learned from those that have yet to be discovered. Many of these unknown species could be at the bottom of Yellowstone Lake right now, but the National Park Service does not have the tools needed to thoroughly characterize the Lake’s deep water ecosystem on their own.
With your help we plan to support the National Park Service by building and operating "Yogi" the Robot, which will be capable of gathering the data they need to more thoroughly understand this unique ecosystem. It is now more feasible and cost-effective to develop a high-quality robotic platform than ever before and it’s finally time to take exploration in Yellowstone Lake to the next level.
Southeast arm of Yellowstone Lake. Image courtesy of Yellowstone National Park.
Who is the Global Foundation for Ocean Exploration?
The Global Foundation for Ocean Exploration (GFOE) is a non-profit engineering organization dedicated to empowering the global science community with robotic tools to explore the world’s oceans and large lakes. GFOE is made up of engineers and explorers who design and operate vehicles used to study the bottom of the ocean and who now plan to build a robot to explore the largely unknown depths of Yellowstone Lake. With the launch of this Kickstarter campaign to build "Yogi" the Robot, we are pioneering a new way to fund underwater exploration--crowdfunding directly through the public, to produce high-definition underwater video and scientific data for the benefit and enjoyment of everyone.
Our President and mentor, Dave Lovalvo, has been exploring the oceans and large lakes of the world with remotely operated vehicles (ROV’s) for over 30 years. In 1985, he had the opportunity to bring the first robotic technology into Yellowstone Lake as an extension of his previous work with underwater vehicles. He partnered with scientists who were interested in studying hydrothermal activity in the Lake at depths greater than what was possible with standard diving techniques. Dave designed the mechanical components, coded the software, and tested and operated this robot himself. This was at a time when ROV’s were an emerging technology and not widely used.
The original Yellowstone Robot, circa 1985. Image courtesy of Bob Landis.
Dave (right) preparing to launch the vehicle. Image courtesy of Bob Landis.
Dave’s novel underwater vehicle was able to capture truly stunning video even with the relatively low-resolution cameras available in the early 1980’s. For the first time, humans were able to see the towering rock formations, sweeping plains, and colorful thermal vents at the bottom of the Lake. Dave and the scientists had discovered what is a complex ecosystem riddled with hydrothermal features as impressive as the geysers that have made Yellowstone so iconic. More than 30 years later, only one other person has gone back into the Lake with robotic technology to help characterize the unique features at its bottom.
Unique rock formations at the bottom of Yellowstone Lake, as imaged by the original Yellowstone Robot.
The shadow of a towering rock formation looms in the background, as imaged by the original Yellowstone Robot.
A school of fish swimming in Yellowstone Lake, as imaged by the original Yellowstone Robot.
We no longer need to rely on one young engineer to design, build, and operate this kind of vehicle on their own. Dave has assembled a team of the brightest young minds in the industry and united them through our non-profit organization. The GFOE team already has experience building and operating underwater robots that explore deep ocean environments in some of the most remote places on Earth through a partnership with NOAA’s Office of Ocean Exploration and Research. Our engineers have successfully managed over 150 ROV dives at depths of up to 3.7 miles, providing ocean scientists with insight into some of the most inaccessible ecosystems on the planet. They have proven themselves to have the professionalism, talent, and determination to continue what Dave started and carry exploration in Yellowstone Lake through the next 30 years.
As such, we are well positioned to build a next-generation robot designed by a new generation of engineers and create the capability for scientists in Yellowstone to make what could be some of tomorrow’s greatest discoveries.
The Global Foundation for Ocean Exploration team in front of the ocean-based Deep Discoverer ROV.
Yellowstone National Park and the Yellowstone Association have offered to provide guidance on the research priorities and on the education and outreach components of the work done by this new robotic platform. Other groups such as the highly-respected Monterey Bay Aquarium Research Institute (MBARI), Woods Hole Oceanographic Institution, U.S. Geological Survey, Oregon State University, University of Minnesota, and Montana State University will make important contributions in guiding some of the science that will be supported by the robot in the years to come.
Why use crowdfunding for this project?
The cost of this kind of vehicle depends largely on its capabilities but they typically cost hundreds of thousands of dollars to build. However, MBARI has provided us with basic mechanical schematics and control software for "Yogi", GFOE engineers have already invested the time to adapt the design, and several major components have been privately donated to the project. One of these private donors has even offered a 1:1 match on any funds raised through Kickstarter, up to $100,000. This means that your donation will effectively be doubled. We have many of the important pieces in place but we need at least $100,000 in public support to raise the $200,000 required to actually build "Yogi" and move the project forward.
Here is a summary of how GFOE hopes to use funds raised through Kickstarter, including the 1:1 match:
HD Camera: $30,000
Robotic Arm: $40,000
Thrusters: $45,000
Buoyancy Foam Pack: $15,000
Navigation Equipment: $20,000
Sensors: $25,000
Tether System: $15,000
Structural Components: $10,000
A photorealistic 3D model of "Yogi" the Robot.
"Yogi" is designed to record high-definition video and enable scientists to collect delicate biological, geological, and chemical samples from thermal features at the bottom of the Lake. Some of its specifications include:
Dimensions: 3ft x 3ft x 4.5ft (the size of a clothes washer/dryer unit)
Weight: 600lbs (scientific payload of up to 120lbs)
Depth Rating: 4,920 feet (1500 meters)
Thrusters: 4 axial, 2 vertical
Multiple high-definition cameras
5-function electric manipulator for sample collection
Suction sampler for sediment and biological material
Temperature sensor
Water sampler for collecting hydrothermal fluids
Chemical sensors for analyzing composition of hydrothermal fluids
130-color sonar
Acoustic navigation system
Expandability for the addition of cameras and sensors in the future
Underwater vehicles of this kind typically have lifespans of 10-20 years which leaves ample opportunity down the road for this robot to explore other large lakes beyond Yellowstone. For now, we at the Global Foundation for Ocean Exploration hope to support scientists in a place that is cherished, provide valuable knowledge for future generations, and foster a growing community of young, passionate explorers.
And, right now, you have the opportunity to help make this happen.
Smoky sunset over Yellowstone Lake. Image courtesy of Yellowstone National Park
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
GFOE engineers have many years of collective experience with remotely operated vehicles and exploring underwater environments. As such, we are familiar with the challenges that face us in the design, construction, and operation of the Yellowstone Robot. Our successful work with vehicles in the deep ocean gives us confidence in our ability to overcome any engineering issues that we may encounter during development and deployment.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
It's hard to believe that it's been almost two years since we launched our Kickstarter campaign to fund a new robot to support exploration and research in Yellowstone Lake. We are proud to finally share with you the first scientific publication to come out of the project!
In the summers of 2016 and 2017, we spent a lot of time in the deepest parts of Yellowstone Lake where there is known to be a lot of hydrothermal activity and large collections of vents. We supported the operation of an autonomous underwater vehicle (AUV) equipped with multibeam sonar that produced higher resolution bathymetric maps of the lakebed than ever before. We, of course, used our new remotely operated vehicle (ROV) Yogi to collect physical samples and film the unique environments at the bottom of the lake. We also put down a number of self-powered temperature/pressure sensors to track water conditions, lake bottom seismometers to measure seismic activity, thermal “blankets” to measure temperature distribution across specific areas of the lakebed, and heat probes to measure temperature gradient profiles in the sediment. These were concentrated around hydrothermally active areas to help scientists learn more about how venting affects these underwater ecosystems over the course of a year.

You've all seen photos and videos of Yogi working in Yellowstone Lake. But you might be wondering how we transport and operate the ROV in the Lake...
It's all made possible by the Research Vessel Annie, the support platform for ROV Yogi. The R/V Annie is named after the first research vessel to sail on Yellowstone Lake during the Hayden Expedition in 1871. She is a 40-foot long aluminum boat and is uniquely outfitted with jet-drive station keeping capabilities. The cabin is set up as a fully climate controlled control room, with a wall of high definition monitors as well as equipment for navigation, video recording, and ROV control.
This one-minute video shows off some of the maneuvering capabilities of the . To learn more, check out its page on our newly renovated !

Many months of determined work by GFOE engineers has finally paid off. Our team of explorers are very excited to finally share with you some of the first underwater video shot by ROV Yogi in Yellowstone Lake. This one-minute preview will give you an idea of what is to come...
While you watch, keep in mind that capturing this footage would not have been possible without your help!

Great news... We have received the funds to build the new Yellowstone Robot and have already started ordering the parts we need. Construction on Yogi's frame began just last week!
Now that the project is gearing up, we will start the process of fulfilling rewards and sending regular updates to all of our generous backers. Thanks again to all of you for making our ‪first Kickstarter‬ campaign a success. Our engineers are thrilled to have seen so much interest and support from the public and can't wait to support science missions in Yellowstone National Park.

The GFOE team can hardly believe it. Thanks to all of you, we successfully reached our goal in the final few hours of the campaign! Once again, we are incredibly pleased and humbled to see the amount of public support for science and exploration in Yellowstone Lake. So...the construction of Yogi will begin soon and we plan to start exploring the Lake by the end of this summer!
We will be sure to keep you updated as the project ramps up. We are a small team and this is our first crowdfunding campaign, so we just ask for your patience as we work out the logistics of delivering the rewards. Please feel free to message us with any questions or concerns that you might have. We will do our best to respond in a timely manner.

campaign.story:
Mamquam LLC is an innovative fashion startup based in Zurich, Switzerland. Our creations are influenced by contemporary culture, technology, minimalism, and functionalism. 
Our first product line, The Chameleon Collection includes the latest technological advancements in fabrics, and stands out for its versatility and state of the art design. We created a new category of pants, the Chameleon, an alternative to both casual and formal everyday trousers.
We want to build the Chameleon together with you, and offer you a discount as an early backer. We are an independent startup without investors or a parent company.
Building the Chameleon trouser is a capital intensive procedure. To go into production we need to make hundreds at a time. Your contributions will enable us to make the first round of production, and help Mamquam become a dynamic company which creates a positive change in peoples lives and the world.
THE CHAMELEON - BEYOND BASIC PANTS
THE CHAMELEON PANTS ARE:  
1) MADE IN EUROPE WITH SWISS MINDSET & QUALITY STANDARDS. A minimalist design combined with fine European craftsmanship. Mamquam works only with the best production partners that ensure supreme quality and ecological standards throughout their entire supply chain. Our fabric is sourced from Switzerland and the Chameleons will be manufactured in Portugal.
2) MADE FROM PREMIUM TECHNICAL FABRIC. The innovative synthetic blend consisting primarily of Micromodal® is designed to have an amazingly soft feel while withstanding tough wear. The combination of fabric and technology enhance the body’s natural cooling functions, block UV rays and make the garment resistant to shrinking, pilling, stains and liquids. 
3) MARTIN ACROSS. MODAFAD “Best Collection Award” contest winner and couturier, Martin Across, is the designer of Mamquam. Martin graduated from Westminster University and Istituto Europeo di Design while living in Barcelona, Spain. His background education includes architecture. 
4) BEST PRICE GUARANTEED. The Chameleon pants are sold directly via Kickstarter enabling us to cut out the retail channel and thereby offer you a premium design trouser that will retail for $220 at only $130.
Non existence of aesthetic constraint-free clothing. The clothing industry has struggled to reconcile fashion and technology. Technical clothing companies which have launched in the past years claim to be fashionable and innovative. However, to put it simply, none of them are, rather they created clothes for hiking and other outdoor specific purposes. Both technical clothing companies and fashion companies make compromises on:  
Elegance for comfort 
Comfort for elegance 
Design over fabric innovation 
Fabric innovation over design 
There is no harmonious balance. 
We have conceptualised a new category of pants, whereas other brands simply combine chinos and technologies. The Chameleon pants meet any formal dress code and are still comfortable for a 12-hour flight. The unique fabric blend results in a perfect balance of comfort, durability and formality, making the Chameleon versatile.  
Short product life cycle / Disposable Fashion Clothing has become something we can purchase every week and toss out every few months.  What that does to the culture of fashion is that we’ve become less attached to each garment as a part of our identity. What we're seeing in the new era of fashion is backpedalling compared to the mindset 20 years earlier, where clothing had a deeper intrinsic value. We are here to change that!

Inspired by minimalism, functionalism, technology and contemporary culture, we set out to design a timeless and stylish everyday trouser.
DESIGNED in Switzerland & Spain
Made in Portugal
Textile technologies from Switzerland
Sophisticated state of the art design (minimalist + elegant) 
Ergonomic design, with more crotch room to breathe
Fashionable pleats 
A medium weight double knit jersey  
Comfortable 'silk-like' pockets, in elegant contrasting colours 
Double reinforced crotch (No more crotch "blow out")  
Velcro closure, (no beeping at airports) 
High quality zippers 
Belt loops (optional)

MACHINE-WASHABLE
No pilling 
No color degrading 
No shrinking
PANTHER CHAMELEON (Black)
JACKSON'S CHAMELEON (Grey)
PARSON'S CHAMELEON (Bordeaux)
VEILED CHAMELEON (Blue)
Same design specs. Just a little more room.

*All regular fits are also available in colours: (Black, Bordeaux, Grey and Navy Blue)
   *Images - Schoeller Textiles
*For both slim and regular fit, we have the following sizes:
We see a need to provide clothing which is great. Clothing which strives for perfection in terms of minimalist aesthetics, functionality and technicality. We are reinventing clothing, to maximize the wearing experience and offer clothing worthy of our times. Our vision is to offer a large spectrum of products which can provide significant improvements to peoples’ lives.  We promise to push the boundaries, continuously redefining existing clothing concepts. Fashion can no longer ignore technology. 
We are based out of our office in Zurich, Switzerland, however all frequently travel and explore the world. Mamquam was founded by Batis and Philip in January 2015, two Swiss high school friends, who then recruited our creative director, Martin Maldonado aka Martin Across.  
Concepts which challenge and allow society to evolve have influenced Martin to express his ideas through drawing and illustration. "I want people not to be guided by how to look, but rather how they would feel, and whom they would transform into, by wearing a piece of clothing".
We are all university students and recent graduates, changing the way we think and dress. Together we brought you the most well designed, technically advanced and ergonomic trousers ever made. The Chameleon.

campaign.story:
Suit buttons are annoying. You know why, but let's refresh your memory...
These are just some of the problems with normal suit buttons:
- They're always the same.
- They're always plain and have nothing personal to them.
- If your jacket is too tight on you or doesn't close at all you have to remove the button and sew it closer to the edge of the jacket
- They get lost or broken at the cleaners.
- There's no possibility of changing them unless you want to spend more than $15 - $20 to get them changed by a tailor. Then, you're back to square one when you get used to those newly-fixed buttons.
- They break. Bringing you to the tailor, again.
That's why we created Cufftore.
All of these problems are fixed with our magnetic Cufftore buttons which easily permits you to change around your buttons between suits.
By backing our Kickstarter you'll be able to make your suit look custom made and always add a fresh look to it.
The Cufftore (which means "button", in Hebrew) design features a redesigned and reimagined suit button with a groove on the inside. We literally had to recreate the standard button, from the bottom up. Our design permits us to place a super-strong neodymium magnet in the center of the button.
Every button comes with a pin tie tack which has a magnetic base, permitting you to slip the pin through your suit and allow the buttons to magnetically connect to your suit.
Furthermore, Cufftore magnetic buttons come pre-sewn with the color thread of your choice. Take that ugly thread!
The magnetic buttons could be as close as you want. They can be:
1) "Kissing, non stacked", which means that they don't overlap, however they touch one another when placed on your suit.
2) "Kissing, stacked" which means that they overlap and that they touch one another when placed on your suit.
3) "Non-kissing", which means that they don't touch each other at all.
To the right - old, plain, junky buttons, and to the left - fresh, awesome-looking, amazing quality buttons ;)
We've also recreated the jacket button. We've set a groove on the back side of the jacket button, enabling us to place a pin tie tack on the inside of it.
Oh, and did we forget to mention that Cufftore is Patent-Pending?
Switch it up whenever you like! Surprise us with your combos!
There are so many different combinations for Cufftore buttons. We can't wait to see what kinds of ideas you guys have in store!
This is for any man or woman who owns a suit. That means that whether you're trying to look preppy or classy, sassy or fancy, this is for you.
We've partnered with Original Standard Button which is one of the leading button wholesalers in Canada, and which manufacturers all of the buttons in Spain. Original Standard Button has been in the business for over 30 years while the manufacturer has been in the business for over 60 years and has specialized in custom button orders. A job like this is like a walk in the park for them. They have reassured us about scheduled timing. They're really awesome.
What you'll receive:
Every backer that pledges $35 ($25 for super-early birds!) or more will receive:
8 Cufftore Magnetic Buttons (4 for each side cuff), with your choice of color button and thread 
8 Magnetic Clutch Bases (as a base for you buttons)
3 Interchangeable Jacket Buttons
1 Thread Cutter
                 Add-ons:
If you'd like to order more buttons (8 buttons without the magnetic pin and 3 jacket buttons) then just add $20 (per set of extra buttons that you'd like) to your pledge and send us a message to let us know. Condition: You must have pledged more than $25. Shipping will be taken care of by pledge of $25 or more.
If you'd like to order 3 more jacket buttons for a double-breasted suit then add $6 to your already-existing pledge. Condition: You must have pledged more than $25. Shipping will be taken care of by pledge of $25 or more.
By backing us you'll be able to choose from one of the following 4 beautiful colours offered: (a survey will be sent out at the end of the campaign for you to let us know which colour buttons you have chosen.)
Coffee Brown | Left: Cuff Button | Right: Jacket Button
Cobalt Blue | Left: Cuff Button | Right: Jacket Button
Camel | Left: Cuff Button | Right: Jacket Button
Charcoal | Left: Cuff Button | Right: Jacket Button
You'll also be able to choose the colour thread you'd like your buttons to come with. There are 5 colour choices to choose from: 
Crimson
Powder Pink 
Sky Blue
Citrine Yellow
Classic Black
Every set of Cufftore magnetic buttons will come with 3 Cufftore interchangeable jacket buttons. The jacket buttons are sewn (with the corresponding color of your choice from the 5 available colors above) and are attached to a pin tie tack and clutch, enabling you to be able to switch around to a different button whenever you'd like, while being very tightly fastened to your suit, just like a normal jacket button.
And let's not forget a very important advantage:
Yup, that's another advantage. We know, we're awesome.
3 easy steps that only need to be done once:
1) Easily remove the old buttons from the suit with the special thread cutter included with the Cufftore buttons
2) Insert the magnetic pin into the suit and lock it in place with the clutch
3) Place the desired buttons
 You now look like a boss ;)
We tried magnets in all types of different sizes and thicknesses... (they're super strong btw!)
We even tried using steel discs...

After more than 6 months of testing, we're here to tell you that cufftore is discreet :)
Because Cufftore buttons are such amazing quality, each set of buttons comes with a lifetime warranty for the buyer.
 *Please note that this covers manufacturing problems such as the thread unraveling, the magnet disconnecting from the button for some reason, or the back butterfly pin/clutch breaking. Buyer takes care of shipping costs and the rest will be done free of charge. Proof of purchase is needed.*
Our number one customer satisfaction goal is to make sure that our magnetic buttons surpass the standard. That's why we have made sure to choose top-quality material to create Cufftore. The buttons are made of high quality polyester and by the end of production finish-off with a glossy finish. Not only do our buttons look and feel like good quality, they really are amazing pieces of work.
To insure this quality aspect, we have pushed for the buttons to be created in Spain, and nowhere else.
We have a few Stretch Goal ideas in mind and they'll be released as soon as possible! Don't worry, you'll love 'em.
Not only do we care about your style, but we also care about those that are less fortunate. With that said, a minimum of 10% of all profits will be given to charitable organizations around the world.
Website: Cufftore.com
American Friends! Take note that all prices are in Canadian Dollars which means it's cheaper for you! :D We got your back lol.
This is the look you'll have on your face when you receive your buttons btw :P
Please note that you may be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your Cities/Country. This is not likely to happen or orders to the U.S and Canada since shipments will be made from both the U.S and Canada.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We have done everything in our power to make sure that we can easily go through this Kickstarter campaign, before and after it, which is why we have gone through every detail of our product prior to starting the campaign. We’ve went through all the prototypes, searched for the best material, did countless tests, and are completely ready for production. We’ve partnered with a very well-known custom button manufacturer in Spain which has been manufacturing buttons for the last 60 years and have done custom button orders daily. This is why we’re able to ship you your rewards in under 60 days. We’re just that awesome. :)

There’s one challenge that we see ourselves possibly getting into. Because Cufftore buttons are created from multiple materials (buttons, magnets, thread, etc..) and requires different labour jobs (manufacturing, threading, gluing etc…), we find that there might be a risk for scheduling between the different jobs needed for the product. However, because we have set ourselves specific dates for production and have organized ourselves beforehand with all necessary workers and contractors, we believe that the possibility of this risk is almost at a zero percent chance of happening. In the very slight possibility that this does happen however, we will be on top of it, access other workers and contractors to get the work done quicker, give you updates along the way and push ourselves as hard as we can in order for there to not be any set-backs. We thank you for trusting us and will do everything in our power to go over and above your expectations for delivery and quality. Thank you.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
"Either we challenge the status quo or we invent the "Pocket Square Snap™."
Boom goes the dynamite!
The pocket square is a subtle way to highlight a bit of personality without causing too much of a scene (unless you want to!) It's a dash of flash.
So why waste time practicing ways to fold pocket squares that rival origami? Now you have the Pocket Square Snap™.
A Pocket Square Snap™ is a little move that makes a big difference in men's style.
 Adam, Omar, and the p.s. mister: team spent countless hours developing, testing, and designing this invention. 
Now you can actually fold silk pocket squares!
They spoke to wardrobe architects, clothiers, tailors, executives, cowboys (you get the picture). It is now time to give the people what they want.
Here's how it works:
It starts with a high quality, metallic card and two lodestones.
Specially designed, rust resistant card with two lodestones (magnets)
 It only takes 3 SIMPLE steps:
Step 1. FOLD your pocket square. Any way, simple or complex. Go ahead, make a design replicating "The Great Wave off Kanagawa"!
Step 2. HOLD your fold in place with one lodestone. Insert in pocket and place second lodestone inside your jacket to secure the pocket square in place.
Step 3. Be BOLD. If you want to be visionary, you have to be bold! With the Pocket Square Snap, you won't be fidgeting and adjusting throughout the night.
The pocket square is the difference between a suit or blazer that any average man can throw on versus one that comes to life and speaks on your behalf when you enter a room. 
SAY GOODBYE TO:
-Wasting time trying to fold a pocket square into the right fold so that it stays in place.
-Finding cheap and inefficient ways to prop it up so it doesn't fall into your pocket (e.g. tissue paper, business cards, etc.)
-Fidgeting in meetings, on dates, or in public.
- Constantly adjusting and pulling your pocket square up in the pocket after it falls down inside.
The Pocket Square Snap™ is a gentleman's secret weapon that takes any suit or blazer from good to amazing.
The Pocket Square Snap™ is your new gadget to help turn heads and elevate your style. The clothes don't make the man, but they do give an idea of who he is.     
(Warning: People might be offended by how damn handsome you look)
I'll be damned.....it really does look like the "The Great Wave off Kanagawa"
Perks you get when ordering your Pocket Square Snap™ 
Here's why the vintage pocket squares you're getting are so special... *(Limited Edition Pocket Square perk only on reward $15, $38, $60, $100, $500, $5000). Select them RIGHT NOW before they're gone!)
In the 1950's, Ms. B. Johnston lived in the east coast in the beautiful state of Delaware. She was a home seamstress, and through the fifties and sixties she collected all types of high quality fabric.
In the 1970's, she moved to Cleveland with her husband where the fabric remained untouched, until it found its way down to Orlando, Florida and into our hands. 
A time capsule from the 1950's
There are small quantities of deadstock fabric floating around all over the country. 
So many choices, so few available
 This makes the p.s. mister: pocket squares unique and limited edition.
Highest Quality, 100% Cotton. 100% Handmade in the USA #baldeagle
2 YEAR WARRANTY 
"Things of quality have no fear of time"
The p.s. mister: Pocket Square Snap™ is built to last. We stand behind the materials and quality of all our products. That's why we are including a 2 year manufacturer’s warranty! 
If there is any problem with the manufacturing or assembly of the product, just ship it to us and we will replace it for FREE. The warranty does not cover dents or scratches, damage from misuse or abuse, loss or theft, or normal wear and tear. 
However! The wear and tear gives the product history and character.
"Wear and tear are signs of a good story"
Production and Delivery Timeline
Once we reach or exceed our funding goal, the timeline for producing and delivering Pocket Square Snap is as follows:
Our logos and timeline are done by the talented Bay area based designer jehankhateeb.com
 A FREE REWARD FOR ALL!
We believe in the idea of sharing knowledge for all. To get a FREE p.s. mister: digital document on "Modern Wisdom for the Good Life", please do the following: 
1) Post a link to our Kickstarter page on Facebook, Twitter, or any social media with the #psmister  #mensfashion #menstyle hashtag.
2) Shoot us an email at psmisterhelp@gmail.com with a screenshot or link to where you shared it.
3) Once confirmed, you'll get: The full PDF of the "Modern Wisdom for the Good Life" for you to download, print, and live by.
Our Story
Omar and Adam met in 2014, and grew to be close friends. They both loved to learn, invent, and give back to the community.
The "One-Two Punch"!
They spent a lot of time together making a ruckus and having fun while doing it.
A Bromance like "Ralph Bro-auren and Georgi-Bro Armani" :::Adam-"Bro you know I love you but that was terrible" Omar-"Wow, ya that was pretty bad. Too lazy to delete it now though" ::accept:: #yolo
So it made sense that they recruit an amazing and talented team, then form a company focused on inventions and developing men into leaders.
#squadgoals
 In the end, their vision and goal is to do something generous and memorable. Support their project, and you can be sure to see more of this!
"The function of leadership is to produce more leaders, not more followers.”
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Risk plays a major part in any manufacturing effort. At p.s. mister:, we have worked very hard to minimize these risks. Our team has over 10 years of experience with manufacturing and design, product packaging, and the order fulfillment process. We’ve worked tirelessly to partner with the best manufacturers to ensure superior quality.

That being said, there are some potential problems that could arise in the production process. Even though the p.s mister: Pocket Square Snap is almost ready to be produced typical lead time from first production run to warehouse delivery is 45 days. This time may run longer if certain delays occur. Such delays are: weather, material supplies, factory availability, and most importantly making sure all products go through our quality testing. All of these different steps take a certain amount of man hours and depending on how high our success of the campaign is could potentially cause some of these delays.

At the end of the day, our goal is to fulfill the product orders as early as possible and to ensure the highest level of quality and customer service. As soon as we receive goods at our warehouse, all units will be inspected and shipped. A tracking number will be sent to the email address associated with your Kickstarter account and the product will reach its final destination.

By backing our Kickstarter project, we understand you are placing serious trust in the p.s. mister: brand, our team and our vision for a premier product. We appreciate every single backer and thank each of you for taking the time to help us along the way.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

DID YOU KNOW.. That science and beauty of the universe are in your pocket?
The Golden Ratio: The style secret that few know how to use.
Style isn’t only about what you’re wearing. It’s about how you decide to think and live. It only makes sense to incorporate a mathematical principle that has been around since the beginning of time. This principle is known as the Golden Ratio.

Style is about who you are, knowing what you want to say, and not giving a damn.

campaign.story:
Rough day at work.
Scramble for a looming deadline. Presentation to a surly manager. Gunfire from villainous henchmen. One of those days.
Your body sweats to keep you cool in tense situations. In fact, your feet have one of the highest concentrations of sweat glands on your body, and are confined in stifling boxes called shoes most of the day. This is not a recipe for feeling (or smelling) like success.
Inspired by the archetypal super-spy, we’ve created the perfect sock to keep you looking and feeling effortlessly cool, whether stress means spreadsheets or shootouts. Through the design process, we’ve tested every product on the market and made dozens of prototypes to reach the perfect blend of features and capabilities. Like an ejection-seat-equipped sports car, the Stealth Sock’s stylishly unassuming exterior conceals the incredible technology and features that make it so awesome.
The secret weapon behind the Stealth Sock is its unique one-two punch of fabric technologies. The first of its kind, bacteriostatic silver and activated carbon infused fibers work synergistically to keep you cool and odorless. Paired with its advanced construction methods and features, there’s no better sock on the market.
Like the agents it's designed for, the Stealth Sock can go anywhere and do anything. Sleek and svelte, it's thin enough to fit perfectly under a handcrafted leather dress shoe, yet its ample cushioning and performance features make it equally at home under boots on the trail or sneakers and jeans off-duty.
New to the Stealth Sock family are the Recon & Zero. Just in time for the campaign's end, these unlocked stretch goals provide the technological punch of the Stealth Sock in more casual or beach-appropriate cuts.
True to its name, the Stealth Sock features an unmatched ability to remain undetectably fresh, even after multiple wears and heavy use. How is that possible? Well:
Stealth Sock silver fabric works by keeping bacteria, the real odor culprits, in check at healthy skin levels; without it, they grow uncontrollably leading to that locker-room smell.
So go ahead, wear 'em again if the situation calls for it. Pack a little lighter for that trip. We won't tell - and nobody else can.
Like your favorite gym gear, Stealth Socks fight rising temps by transporting moisture away from your skin while improving air circulation and breathability.
To prove the Stealth Sock’s performance, we had samples tested at a 3rd party laboratory certified by the American Association of Textile Chemists and Colorists.
In addition to keeping feet dry and breathable, the Stealth Sock features strategically placed cushioning and a seamless toe for maximum comfort and wearability.
Stylish clothes are worthless without proper fit, and state-of-the-art socks are useless if you spend half your time pulling at and adjusting them. By pairing our unique fiber blend with top of the line fit features, you can be confident that your Stealth Socks will always stay in place and never let you down.
Self-adjusting cuff conforms to your calf
The Stealth Sock's unique fiber blend give it a higher degree of stretch and adaptability than most other products. As a result, it fits comfortably on feet from US Men’s 5/Women’s 6 to Men’s 14/Women’s 15.
Lengthwise stretch
Some brands have caught criticism for allowing silver to leach out of their clothes and onto their wearers. Unlike cheaper, coated threads, the Stealth Sock utilizes a polymeric matrix design to encapsulate the silver in its fibers. This means the odor-fighting ability is proven to stay in the sock and off your skin, all while ensuring antimicrobial effectiveness even after 100+ washes.
When we were testing other socks on the market, nothing irritated us more than spending $30 on a pair with some cool technology, only for it to pill to shreds and disintegrate after only a few wears. We vowed never to make that mistake. Besides using a naturally more wear-resistant fabric, we added:
               The Covert Travel Kit
Designed with versatility in mind, the Covert Travel Kit’s zippered pockets and elastic straps make it the perfect case for carrying and organizing your gear in any situation. Built out of heavy-duty nylon, toss it into your suitcase for your next trip or use the integrated webbing system to strap it into a bag or pack.
 Load outs might include:
Toiletries, shaving gear, and documents for travel
First aid items, tools, and a flashlight to keep in the car
Hard drive, cables, and a mouse for work on the go
Pocketknife, chargers, and pens for EDC
Survival tools and emergency supplies for camping
The Deodorizer
Built with the same charcoal carbon technology, the Deodorizer is a natural companion to our Stealth Socks. Coming in a two pack, the Deodorizer captures odor with a slim and convenient form factor, perfect for slipping into shoes, gym bags, suitcases, or anywhere else odors or humidity aren't welcome.

Customize Your Loadout
Additional deodorizers, travel kits, and Stealth Socks available as add-ons via backer survey at the end of the campaign.
            Meet the founders: Gabby, Ben, and Kevin
Maison Impeccable was founded in early 2015 by a few high school friends from Michigan reuniting from coast to coast through a shared passion for style and a love of action flicks. Our team spans a diverse range of industries and experiences: business, medicine, retail, tech, and even finance - all of which help to give us unique insights and perspectives into the clothes we wear and how we can improve them.
Despite differing backgrounds, we all independently ended up at the same conclusion: today’s clothes simply aren’t as good as they should be, always forcing us to sacrifice on one aspect or another. We’re not the first to come up with this idea either - a handful of other brands are paving the way and doing great work. That said, when we tried what was on the market, something always wasn’t quite right. Sure, A was great, but B was all wrong. Why didn’t they do C and had they even considered D? Rather than wait for companies to magically figure out and produce what we wanted, we decided strike out on our own. We were already reading and learning about this stuff obsessively in our free time, why not make something of it?
The Support Team
As much work as we've put in over the past year and change, we wouldn't be where we are today without all the people who've helped us along the way. Among others, we'd like to thank:
Maison Impeccable is a startup dedicated to evolving garments and how we interact with them. By analyzing clothing equally through the lenses of utility and aesthetics, we seek to engineer pieces that offer uncompromising performance across all use cases. Building upon the belief that each individual is the hero of their own life, our goal is to keep wearers outfitted for the day’s missions, wherever they may lead.
As the common Kickstarter story goes, the traditional model of buy-first-sell-later manufacturing is too expensive for new brands just getting started.
To make Stealth Socks, we need to make a minimum order from our factory of several thousand pairs - after all, it doesn’t make sense for them to set up and retool machines to make a few dozen socks. Crowdfunding on Kickstarter lets us secure enough initial orders to make a large production run so we can bring costs and prices down to reasonable levels. Without you, we’d have to either make a small order with a crazy-high cost, or keep thousands of pairs sitting around in a warehouse as we find buyers one-by-one.
Funding raised through the campaign will go towards production, manufacturing, and shipping the Stealth Sock as well as fuel the development of awesome new product lines in the future!
All orders will be shipped from our fulfillment warehouse in Georgia. We evaluated dozens of companies for reputation, reliability, and experience before choosing this critical partner. We're proud to offer free shipping within the United States for all Kickstarter backers.
For operatives outside of the US, shipping will add a small fee to cover added costs. Taxes, VAT and/or duties aren’t included in the prices and may be added in accordance with your local regulations.
Because policies around customs and duties can vary by country, please check yours in advance to avoid any complications down the line!
  For any press enquiries, please contact press@impeccable.maison
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
“What’s life without a little risk?”

Words to live by, maybe not what you look for in your Kickstarter projects. When the Stealth Sock is successfully funded, we will do everything in our power to ensure we meet our timeline. We’ve spent thousands of hours working to develop and sync manufacturing, packaging, and logistics to be ready to hit the ground running as soon as our timer hits zero. With dozens of samples crafted and delivered to friends, media, and testers around the world, all elements of our supply chain have been tested and tuned. We will deliver.

The most likely risks have to do with timing: machine time for production, logistics time across the ocean, and fulfillment time to get into your hands. We’re keeping our partners in those fields ready and will continue to do so throughout the campaign so we should be ready to go.

Beyond that, we don’t see any direct risks or challenges, but the path to get here frequently reminded us that life always has a few surprises in store. Our diverse backgrounds and experiences will help us manage whatever might pop up, and counter to our otherwise clandestine ways, we promise to run this campaign with clear communication and full transparency.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Design
Traditional cotton towels are bulky, heavy, trap dirt, and take forever to dry. These inconveniences are something that we’ve all dealt with, and this led us to create the ultimate towel. 
We couldn’t make any compromises and met each of the following goals: 
Beach towel size
Dries 3x quicker than cotton
Absorbs 3x its weight
Soft & Durable
Anti-bacterial to eliminate odors
Super compact with integrated elastic band
Ultra lightweight
Uses less water to wash
Recyclable
Inspired by our passion for travel, we created geometric patterns that represent our love for peaceful ocean waves, golden desert sunsets, and breathtaking summits.
Efficient
Whatever the situation may be, Acteon towels have you covered. Our microfiber towels dry 3x quicker than the average cotton towel. Microfiber has this ability because it is made with ultra-thin strands that are 10 times thinner than a human hair. Additional benefits of microfiber are that it is super soft, incredibly durable, and uses less water to wash.
Anti-bacterial
Acteon towels are designed to stay fresh even after repeated use. Our towels are treated with silver antimicrobial ions that prevent the growth of bacteria. By prohibiting the growth of bacteria, Acteon towels will maintain their color and remain odor-free. Microfiber adds to this effect because it has natural antibacterial properties that trap less dirt as it dries.
Compact
Space is always a premium whether you’re traveling abroad to an exotic destination, or to the local beach. Acteon towels fold easily and quickly into a compact size that is 3x smaller than your average cotton beach towel. Each towel is marked with integrated stitches to guide folding. Once folded, the towel is bound with an elastic band to snuggly keep it in place. The tag attached to the band can be used with a carabiner to connect to a pack while rolled or use it to hang dry. Aside from consuming minimal space, Acteon towels only weigh 8.7 ounces.
The tag can be used as a hanging loop for faster drying

With that said, there are always unforeseen events that can happen, especially when dealing with a factory that’s half a world away. campaign.story:
Hello!
First of all I want to apologize, our pictures are not professionally done, it is just my wife and I's handy work and we probably should not quit our day jobs! If you made it past that fact, you will see we are passionate about our bow ties and lapels, but most of all we are passionate about giving back to schools and kids!
Science, Technology, Engineering, and Math (STEM)
25 years ago the United States led the world in high school and college graduation rates. Today, the U.S. dropped to 20th and 16th. The World Economic Forum ranks the United States No. 48 in quality of math and science education. The need for high-skilled workers will continue to rise, and if our current STEM Education rate continues the U.S. may be short 3 million high-skilled workers in 2018. Two thirds of those jobs require post-secondary education. 
It's our goal, that when you purchase a lapel or bow tie you will be helping kids get the proper STEM education they so desperately need. 
How we plan on helping:
Establish our 501(c)(3) nonprofit so we can raise money, and donate to schools in need of computers, science equipment, etc.
Donate to said nonprofit (through product sales)
Raise awareness of the STEM education crisis by highlighting STEM professionals, showcases, social media posts, etc.
What we do now:
Donate $1 for every product sold to STEM Education
Name our bow ties after famous, and not-so-famous scientists spreading awareness
Look cool while doing so
Our work
All of our bow ties come with a handmade adjustable strap, and our lapels come with a pin and clutch to attach to a coat or jacket.
Our handmade elastic strap - we tired fabric and nylon but found this thick elastic to be the best feel and fit. Will adjust to neck sizes 13" to 20"
Our most popular framed bow tie with a midnight blue powder coating
Our brand new Sagan bow tie
Hokusai lapel and the Sagan bow tie
 Reward Options:
Shoemaker choices: (from top left) Jeans, Blue, Blue/White Polka, Navy/White Polka, Blue/Blue Polka, Navy/Green Polka, Black
Lapel options: Monet (left) Hokusai (right)
Framed options: Einstein (left) Bell (right)
Framed powder coated options: Shown in Blue, you have the choice of: Yellow, Red, Green, and Blue with any center fabric you want.
Framed with fabric options: Sagan, Newton, Galileo
So why Kickstarter?
We launched twenty two tie December 27th, 2015 and had our first sale January 3rd, 2016. By the end of January we had sold out of everything. Currently we are out of product. 
We want to lower our cost making the bow ties, and opening it up to the Kickstarter community would help us pass on the savings in production to our customers. With your help we can do this. I think the more bow ties and lapels we can sell the more STEM Education can be promoted.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
I still work full time, and this is my first company I have started. I believe the biggest obstacle will be time. It is time consuming to make the handmade neck straps, the center straps, and every bow tie. Working full time and then coming home to work on twenty two tie. This is not a challenge I shy away from though, I love promoting STEM and my bow ties and lapels which drives me to make this work.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
The Italian craftsmen at Ace Marks are the same men and women who work for some of the most renowned luxury brands in the world. Their craftsmanship is deeply rooted in tradition and they have been thriving for four generations. Together, we created an attainable, handcrafted, ultra-luxury dress shoe that comes packed with features and is designed for comfort. Their traditional construction is combined with our innovative design and bold attitude. Ace Marks shoes are built for the modern gentleman. Help us make our first production!
Whether you’re heading a startup or running a Fortune 500 company, Ace Marks shoes make a bold, powerful statement.
Ace Marks is the first and only luxury brand that will buy back its shoes. Kickstarter supporters will be able to send back their old Ace Marks for a $60 credit towards a new full priced pair purchased from our website. We partnered with Career Gear, a leading national organization helping men in need, to donate your old shoes and help men get back on their feet and re-enter the work force. The latest details regarding this program can be found at www.acemarks.com.
The Vincent is a versatile dress shoe that can be worn for your Monday morning meeting or a casual night out and anything in-between. Decorative perforation and broguing details preserve tradition, while contrasting leathers stake new style ground. These wingtips strike the perfect balance between traditional and modern.
The Griffin can adapt to your mood and will never let you down. The usually reserved cap-toe oxford takes a bold step forward with understated color blocking and polished pairings of leather and suede.
The Brody goes just great with a suit or paired with khakis or jeans. Rendered in richly oiled leathers and furnished with a traditional apron toe, the Brody fuses a classic preppy style with modern elegance.
The Logan’s contrast of materials and tones gives these lace-ups a powerful, authoritative look, but it's the broguing that sets this stylish boot apart. The rubber outsole adds a level of toughness, to a very commanding appearance.
Each pair of Ace Marks dress shoes is made with full grain calf leather and is crafted, dyed, and burnished by hand. The manual process gives each pair its unique characteristics. Each pair goes through a rigorous inspection to ensure that every shoe is of the highest quality.
Our manufacturing process is done completely in-house. Each shoe takes great precision and skill to ensure the outcome is impeccable. 
Becoming one of our backers means much more than just buying a world class shoe at an amazing price. Each backer at any pledge level:
Will be Added to our Ace Marks Elite to get exclusive access to limited run shoes and colors. 
Will be able to sell their old Ace Marks Italian Luxury Statement shoes back to us for $60.
No middlemen. No crazy markup. Just magnificent shoes at a magnificent price that we will buy back when you're ready for a new pair.
Our disruptive business model goes beyond cutting out the middle man to give our supporters direct to consumer pricing.
We created the Leave Your Marks program to activate the Ace Marks family and incentivize giving back. By sending back your worn Ace Marks Italian Luxury Statement shoes every time you buy a new full priced Italian luxury Statement shoe from www.acemarks.com, you, our Kickstarter supporters, not only get a $60 credit and a great reason to keep your shoe game fresh, you also participate in changing someone's life. 
To make sure that our shoe donations are put to good use, we partnered with Career Gear to donate them to help men in need enter the workforce, stay employed and become role models and mentors to their families and communities.
Ace Marks is the first and only luxury shoe company to do this!
We're excited to see how many men we can help get back on their feet! Get the latest details about this program at www.acemarks.com.
When it comes to luxury, no matter how good your shoe looks, comfort is just as important. Ace Marks shoes are bold, flexible, and light. 
We spent 3 years in development to make sure that we get it right, and we spared no expense. Each pair is superbly handcrafted, hand burnished, and packed with features.   
That's why Ace Marks shoes:
Are made from hand-selected full-grain leather.  
Use a lightweight Blake Flex construction and leather outsole that allows for easy, effortless movement. 
Reduce common pressure points around the heel and mid-foot with a carefully constructed last (a.k.a. forma). 
Relieve stress as you walk with a cushioned leather insole, which molds to your foot over time for added comfort. 
Are lined with supple calfskin to keep your feet dry and cool. 


Ace Marks was designed for the modern gentleman looking to step up his style and add a bit of swagger. The Ace Marks man is not afraid to be bold in his success.
Our shoes go well beyond comfort and style. By cutting out the middlemen, we’re able to deliver the highest quality product at a market disruptive price. Luxury doesn't have to cost a small fortune.
Ace Marks shoes are statement shoes. They are well-made, attractive and eye-catching shoes that reflects your personality
Our designs are modern classics in unique color and material combinations, and packed with features
Ace Marks is for the modern gentleman that appreciates craftsmanship and style.
Ace Marks Shoes are available from size 5 to 14, including half sizes. They are a "D", medium/standard width. We cut them generously around the midfoot and heel to prevent unnecessary pressure on the foot.
Our shoes fit true to US sizing. Still, it will be VERY important that you follow our fitting & sizing instructions that you will receive once the campaign has ended. The survey where you choose your style, color, and size will include instructions on how to measure your foot to assure the best fit. If the size you order happens to not be the best fit, we will exchange it for you (please see DELIVERY section below for shipping charges on exchanges).
We look forward to adding widths and larger sizes in the future. We are here for YOU!
Our team is ambitious. We know that we made a world class luxury dress shoe, full of features you will love. As we reach our funding goals, we want to give you more products and more choices. 
We have more styles and accessories waiting to be unlocked!
Our stretch goals are the beginnings of more luxury footwear choices for you. Help us reach our stretch goals so that we can show you how much more there is to Ace Marks!
Once the campaign is funded, we expect that it will take 2-3 weeks for us to send the survey and receive back the style, color, and size surveys from all backers. The faster we get them back the less likely any delays!
Production typically takes 8 weeks, and shipping approximately 3 weeks.
By the end of July 2016, or sooner, we expect to be shipping to you from our facility in Miami, FL.
We are very experienced in delivering shoes on time! We will do everything in our power to make sure we meet the timeline. 
We will make sure that you get what you ordered and on time.
Shipping is included for all shipments in the continental United States. 
However, if the need for an exchange arises, we will need to charge for the exchange shipping both ways as we are a startup and work with very small margins on Kickstarter. This is true for domestic & international orders. 
The cost of international duties and shipping will depend on the destination.
Continental US & Canadian orders will ship from our facility in Miami, FL. 
All other orders will ship from our fulfillment center in the EU. Orders shipped within the EU will not incur customs duty charges, but will be subject to VAT. 
Expected international shipping rates, including Canada, can be found here. The cost of international shipping & VAT (if applicable) will be charged at the time of the survey once the campaign is over. 
If applicable, duties and local taxes will be charged by the appropriate authority at the destination country. Please determine these charges locally.
Ace Marks wasn't created on a whim. It is the product of a lifetime of research and experience in the luxury footwear business.
Our founder, Paul, grew up traveling with his parents to Italy & Spain's shoe factories. Formally educated in International Finance & Marketing at the University of Miami, he and his brother Daniel, as their parents before them, have dedicated their lives to designing and producing luxury footwear of the highest quality. Their footwear experience ranges from designing & manufacturing to marketing, warehousing and logistics. They have done it all.
To assure that our supporters receive top notch service, we put together a team with extensive experience in footwear logistics and distribution. For three years, our team has prepared for the launch of Ace Marks, and we are excited to share our product and vision with the world!
Quality. We spent a lot of time finding the best artisans in Italy that have the materials, the facilities, the pedigree and, most importantly, the experience to create a world-class luxury shoe. We spared no expense to make sure that you will get only the best.
Affordability. By implementing a disruptive business model that delivers your shoes straight from the artisan's hands to your doorsteps, we eliminate the need for retailers, wholesalers, and other middlemen. The workmanship and luxury you will experience with our shoes is incomparable, at a price that is unparalleled. Less than $200 for a $600-$1,000+ shoe. We did it for YOU.
Communication. Your commitment to us is the start of a long, beautiful relationship. We are committed to you. We will keep our relationship strong by delivering amazing products and communicate with you every step of the way. You will get regular updates as we fund, produce, and ship out your one-of-a-kind shoes. If you have an itch to talk to us, just get in touch any time!  
Consistency. Every Ace Marks shoe is hand crafted and hand dyed, meaning that no two pairs are identical. However, each pair goes through a thorough inspection process to assure the quality you expect from a world-class luxury brand.
Experience & Reliability. Ace Marks was founded by a team with a lifetime of experience in the luxury footwear industry. We don't make commitments that we can't honor. We have the infrastructure to assure a smooth process from taking your order thru delivery. We want to be your go-to brand for all things men's luxury, and we will earn your confidence. 
We are building more than a shoe, we are building a family. The Ace Marks Family!
Dear Supporters, 
Over the last 3 years, we have poured our heart and soul into bringing Ace Marks to life. We have traveled over 35,000 miles by plane, train, and automobile and spent thousands of hours in factories, designing, developing prototypes, and generally planning how to make a luxury dress shoe that will make you look good and feel powerful every time you put them on. When you receive your first pair of Ace Marks shoes, it will be clear to you that we accomplished our goal. Now we just need you to help us get to the finish.
From the start, it was also very important to us that Ace Marks makes a strong impact on our community. With so many men and women struggling to support their families, we want to do our part to help them overcome at least one of the obstacles that they are facing, which is to find meaningful employment. That is why we partnered with Career Gear and implemented our buy back program. We hope that our shoe donations will help thousands of men take their first steps into a brighter future.
With your help, we will grow Ace Marks into a luxury lifestyle brand driven by a commitment to fine craftsmanship, beautiful aesthetics, and your happiness. It is for you, that we will continue to innovate and create.
Through our journey, we have learned that Ace Marks is ultimately about empowerment. We are empowering you with confidence and direct access to luxury statement shoes, and we are empowering men across the country to get back on their feet.
Thank you for allowing us to do what we love and for spreading the word. Share our campaign with the world.
YOU are key to the success of our campaign, and ultimately our company. Without you, we don't have a reason to exist. We need your support to get us off the ground and to assure that modern gentleman everywhere have access to luxury Italian statement shoes! 
As you become part of our inner circle, help us by sharing our campaign with YOUR inner circle. Thank you!
                                                                  Leather Outsole - Properly Finished

We have a lifetime of experience in luxury footwear manufacturing and logistics. We are well organized and prepared to confront any situation that may arise. We have seen it all.

campaign.story:
Subscribe to our YouTube Channel
Follow us on Facebook
Support us on Patreon
Subscribe to our YouTube Channel Follow us on Facebook Support us on Patreon
Super Science Friends is an animated series about a team of super-powered scientists who travel through time fighting nazis, renegade soviet cosmonauts and their own scientific rivals!
The First Episode
In 2014 we successfully Kickstarted the pilot episode of Super Science Friends. "Episode 1: The Phantom Premise" was released this past October!
If you haven't seen it yet, check out the full episode here:
Since its launch, Episode 1 has been named a Vimeo Staff Pick, shared over 12,000 times on Facebook and viewed over 600,000 times between Facebook, Vimeo and YouTube!
Now we're asking you to help us continue the adventures of Tesla, Freud, Marie Curie, Darwin, Tapputi and Einstein! We've got great new rewards, as well as updated versions of your favourites from the first Kickstarter.
What's Next?
The number one question we're being asked right now is "When will episode 2 be released?".  With your help, we'll be able to answer that question with a resounding "Soonish!"
And to avoid having another long delay between episodes, we're hoping to fund at least the next three episodes. Hopefully even more!
What Will the Next Episodes Be About?
Great question!  Since October, we've been busy writing the next episodes.  We want them to focus on each member of the team, and their rivals.  Here's a snapshot of what we have in mind:
Episode 2: Electric Boogaloo (Tesla vs. Edison)
Thomas Edison is stealing the world's supply of electricity, and only his one-time employee Nikola Tesla knows how to stop him!
Episode 3: Freudian Sleep (Freud vs. Jung)
Join Sigmund Freud as he battles Carl Jung, Master of Dreams, inside the twisted Zardozian landscape that is Freud's subconscious.
 Episode 4: Nobel of the Ball (Marie Curie vs. Nobel Prize Stealing Nazis!)
The Nazis have stolen all the world's Nobel prizes ... except for two!
The Rewards
The rewards from the first Kickstarter went over really well, and because of that we've kept your old favourites as well as added some exciting new ones!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Having gone through the first Kickstarter, and produced the pilot episode, as well as all the rewards, we now have a firm understanding of what it takes to produce a show like Super Science Friends.

A big challenge of doing the first episode was producing all the initial assets for the show, such as character and background designs as well as defining the look and feel of the animation. On top of that, we also started to get a sense of what the personalities of the different characters are, and how they interact with one another.

We now want to build on that to create an even better finished product for our viewers.

The biggest challenge will be to scale up production from working on one episode to working on at least three at once. Luckily our animators are now seasoned veterans when it comes to Super Science Friends, and we'll be able to hit the ground running!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.creator_bio:
Tinman Creative Studios
3 created · 23 backed
We're a tiny little animation studio up here in Toronto, Canada. We have a great team of artists and mainly focus on 2D frame-by-frame...See more

updates.update_content: As we're down to the last few hours, I wanted to thank everyone who contributed to the Kickstarter.  You're all awesome and your enthusiasm, engagement and energy are what keep us going! And even though we didn't reach our goal, you can expect to see some cool Super Science Friends stuff in the coming months.
For a glimpse into the kind of research that goes into making an episode of Super Science Friends, check out this Pop Up video we've put together of Episode 1.

One of the really unexpected things to come out of our first episode of Super Science Friends has been the fan art!  It's really weird and wonderful to see people drawing characters I came up with, and I wanted to share some of that weird wonderfulness with you guys.  If you like their art, click on the image and it'll take you to their Tumblrs/Instagrams/Blogs etc.  Check them out and give them some of those sweet, sweet likes.

updates.update_userinfo: Interview, Live Stream posting, and the YouTubes
updates.update_content:
Interview
I recently did an interview with Rodrigo at Frame Freak Studio. Joining me was Super Science Friends' lead animator and storyboard artist Laurel Dalgleish. In it we discuss the show, our process and tips for new artists starting out in the industry.  It's a nice lengthy interview too, so you know it's good!
Live Stream Posting
Here are some gif animations we did this week and posted on our Facebook page.  Each of these is a little teaser for the next three episodes.

Hello everyone!
We just crossed over the $20,000 mark and have over 300 backers!  We're still a long ways off though, so please share a link to the Kickstarter on all your social networks!  Tell your friends, enemies and wealthy aunts and uncles that you support science satire and they should too!
On another note, we've had some requests for new reward tiers and we've listened!  Here's a rundown of what's new!
$15 - Digital Artbook

We just passed $10,000! Thank you to everyone who has backed us so far!
A few months before we finished episode 1, we reviewed how it was looking at that time.  It was really long, and really slowly paced, bordering on boring.  We decided to spend a day discussing ideas on how to make it better, snappier, funnier and all around a better show.
In the room was myself, Laurel Dalgleish (our storyboard artist and lead animator), and Kevin Williams (animator and writer of episode 2).

Off to a Start
We just passed the $5,000 mark on this Kickstarter which means it's time for our first update!
First off, thanks to everyone who's contributed.  We're really excited to keep this show going, and the feedback we've gotten from the first episode has been incredible.

project_data.project_name: Super Science Friends - The Next Episodes!

campaign.story:
BASE by Wiivv is a body-perfect insole that is engineered to maximize comfort, promote alignment and lessen fatigue. Your pair of BASE insoles will closely follow your unique foot curves to give you the support and stability that you need to keep going. To customize your pair of insoles and get measured, all you need is 5 minutes and a smartphone. With this kind of convenience, you’ll never want to go for off-the-shelf again.
Getting your BASE insoles is easy. 2D images are taken through the Wiivv smartphone app to capture the unique contours of your feet. These images are verified by an expert and processed in Wiivv’s blazing-fast customization engine to produce a 3D-printable file for a pair of insoles to perfectly fit you and you only. This unique file is then sent to enterprise-grade 3D printers that use SLS technology (a system of powerful and precise lasers) to build a durable and flexible shell. Finally, skilled workers use their crafting knowledge to deftly apply a beautifully designed top layer along with features to further improve comfort, like silicon treads and cushions.
In a kinematic analysis done by a 3rd party, BASE custom insoles were seen to significantly reduce joint loading in the knee and hip – which can translate to increased performance in endurance sports. They give you more control with every step you take and help spread the impact force of walking and running activities to areas best suited for absorption.
Our specially designed heel cup delivers optimum stability, shock absorption and comfort. The “hole in the heel cup” design was created in collaboration with pedorthic experts to reduce heel raise. Reduced heel raise is a key feature that allows users of BASE insoles to keep the built-in or removable insoles of their current footwear. The ¾ shell delivers biomechanical neutrality, lessens pressure on the forefoot, and offers better stability.
The first step to getting your BASE custom insoles is to download the Wiivv iOS app, where you will create your very own pair of custom, 3D printed insoles in 5 minutes or less. (Note: iPhone and iPod touch available now. iPad and Android will be available by the summer.) Inside the app, you’ll have a wide range of artsy colours, designs and comfortable top sheets to choose from. Video walkthroughs will guide you through capturing two photos of each foot for the measurement step. That's all you'll need to do! No expensive consultations with your local foot specialist, and no need to try on dozens of flimsy insoles at the pharmacy. Wiivv makes true comfort accessible to you for only $75 (MSRP) per pair of custom insoles.
Function always comes first, but style matters too. We invested in the details of our product, from your name engraved on the bottom of your Wiivvs to the variety of beautifully designed top layers.
4 base colors.
8 top sheet patterns and colors.
Below is the actual package BASE insole backers will receive in the mail. Each one includes a custom pair of Wiivvs with the design options chosen inside the app, a usage guide, and a massage ball to relax your arch muscles.
To use the physical product, place it on top of your shoe’s factory-installed insole, and push it back so it’s nestled neatly in the heel area. For better positioning, we recommend that you be seated when inserting your feet.
Led by Wiivv's own biomechanics team, BASE’s development was done in partnership with experts in the fields of sports medicine and orthopaedics in the effort to create the ultimate custom insole. The team identified and improved on critical design features that affect insole comfort and effectiveness, such as the medial/lateral arch shape and offset, insole contour and thickness, shock absorbing heel pad, cushioning top layer, insole length and shape to maximize flexibility in 1st MPJ joint, and heel cup shape and depth.
We enlisted a group of 100 superheroes in our West Coast community to stress-test and fine-tune the product we bring to market. We put a specific focus on people who spend full days on their feet as part of their work - we call them “the industrial athletes”. The group of people tested include fire-fighters, servers, nurses, and film industry veterans.
BASE fills the wide gap in the product offerings available between a corrective orthotic and an off-the-shelf insole. Corrective orthotics are usually custom, but are costly. Off-the-shelf insoles have lower price points, but they do not fit your unique contours.
We want to create a meaningful stretch goal that will incent our backers to join us. If we reach $250,000, we vow to offer ALL of our backers a promo code for a $25 discount on a pair of BASE insoles after we have completed fulfilling our Kickstarter pairs. You can use this code for a second pair of insoles for another pair of shoes - or perhaps you will gift them to a friend. Those who buy multiple - will receive a code for every pair purchased. 
Our design process went through a year of R&D that resulted in 8 generations of feature sets and an astounding 72 product iterations. Having vigorously tested our product and the viability of our platform, we are unique in our ability to fulfill orders shortly after completing a successful Kickstarter campaign. The Wiivv platform is all about on-demand customization. Giving backers access to our product in record-time is just another application of that philosophy.
We have developed a suite of technologies that we call our ‘Adaptive Manufacturing System’. This system can be applied to make any device for the human body customizable with disruptive levels of convenience and affordability for the end user. The core component of the Adaptive Manufacturing System is our proprietary product customization engine. In seconds, the engine interprets data from the human body and spits out 3D print-ready files that are perfectly custom and optimized for biomechanics.
Below, you’ll see one of Wiivv’s printers manufacturing a batch of custom insoles. That’s followed by the delicate separation and preparation of parts by our technicians before our skilled handworkers add the finishing touches.
3D systems SLS Printers In Action
Wiivv is headquartered in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada, and has an R&D and manufacturing facility in San Diego, California.
Wiivv was co-founded by Louis-Victor Jadavji and Shamil Hargovan in 2014 with the drive to make body-perfect gear, including custom insoles, accessible to the masses. Ben Wynne, a former HP Labs 3D technologist and Wiivv’s Chief Technology Officer, leads a strong technical team that includes experts in biomechanics, mechatronics, mechanical, software, and computer vision engineering.
The team has been advised by industry leaders in biomechanics, additive technologies and lifestyle brands to help ensure that our product, platform and brand are built to last.
If you are still reading - we want to thank you for sharing in our vision. We are passionate about building great products for you and hope that you will join us in this critical part of our journey.
Please reach out to ask questions or provide feedback at hello@wiivv.com
#KEEPGOING
The Wiivv Tribe
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
It is a daunting feat to scale up a company with the capability of mass customizing 3D printed goods. The key elements to success are expertise and capital. We have dedicated the last 12 months to creating a suite of technologies that we call an ‘Adaptive Manufacturing System’ which begins with digital capture and ends with manufacturing of a made-to-fit 3D printed product. We have achieved this with having the right team on board - with CTO Ben Wynne - former 3D technologist from HP Labs leading the charge. 

The funds raised on Kickstarter will allow us to focus on the last step of the process: manufacturing and fulfilling the product we have spent a year developing to a group of early adopters. We are obsessed with a vision of 100% satisfaction and want to keep our promise to deliver all goods within 3 months of our campaign. In fact - we want our first adopters to have their pairs delivered 2 weeks after digitization. This is our promise as a company long term - and we want to demonstrate that we can - and will - make good on that.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
