campaign.story:
VISIT www.brushield.xyz for more!
FACT #1: FECAL MATTER FOUND ON MORE THAN 60% OF TOOTHBRUSHES IN BATHROOMS
You put your toothbrush in your mouth twice a day, but do you ever think of what's lurking on it? 
At the American Society for Microbiology’s annual meeting, June 2015, in New Orleans, a disturbing scientific finding was announced: 
There is a 60% chance your toothbrush is covered in poo.
Fecal particles can spread to a toothbrush through the air after flushing.
Aerosols can spread about 6 to 9 feet when the toilets flushed and all those little droplets of water that come out of the toilet can contain bacterias, viruses and parasites.
Bacteria in the faeces particles can lead to severe illnesses such as diarrhoea.
You can watch the full length American Society for Microbiology interview video of researcher, Lauren Aber, by clicking here. 
Dr. Mehmet Oz also ran a test on a random toothbrush from the crowd on his TV show and found 3 dangerous bacterias on the randomly picked toothbrush:
E.coli (can cause diarrhea, bloody diarrhea or abdominal cramps)
Klebsiella Oxytoca (can cause thrombophlebitis, urinary tract infection, cholecystitis, diarrhea, upper respiratory tract infection, wound infection, osteomyelitis, and meningitis)
Enterobacter (can cause bacteremia, lower respiratory tract infections, skin and soft-tissue infections, urinary tract infections, endocarditis)
A more disturbing fact is 8 out of 10 times, that poop-residue on your toothbrush came from someone else using the same bathroom.
Here is a research video on "How toilet germs can reach your tootbrush?":
FACT #2: GERMS GROW FASTER IN MOIST ENVIRONMENTS, LIKE YOUR TOOTHBRUSH
Do you think poop is the only threat for your toothbrush and thereby your health? 
Unfortunately NO!
Germs are everywhere and they grow faster in moist environments.  
Not allowing the head of the toothbrush to dry out between uses create an environment where germs grow faster on toothbrush.
Adequate ventilation is needed to allow toothbrush dry out between uses.
Do not completely cover toothbrush or store them in closed containers.
Which can, again, lead to many severely dangerous illnesses like gum diseases as Dr. Oz says.
The bacteria that cause gum diseases are anaerobic. That means they live in a low oxygen environment and these bacteria are killed by exposure to air.
The simple act of letting your toothbrush dry out between uses will kill many germs.
FACT #3: SHARING A TOOTHBRUSH HOLDER IS THE SHORTEST WAY TO CROSS-CONTAMINATION
If you are sharing a toothbrush holder and one of the users is infected, it's highly possible for you to get sick soon.
When you brush, you remove plaque and particles so toothbrushes can become contaminated with bacteria, blood, saliva, and oral debris. 
This contamination can be passed right back to you or to others who share the same holder.
If more than one brush is stored in the same holder or area, keep the brushes separated to prevent cross-contamination.
Make sure everyone has their own toothbrush by color-coding them.
Replace your toothbrush regularly after you've had any illness such as a cold or flu because germs can remain even after you've recovered.
It's a good idea to replace your toothbrush after you've had any illness such as flu. 
FACT #4: TOOTHBRUSHES ARE EXPOSED TO MANY OTHER EXTERNAL THREATS
Besides major toilet germs (E.Coli, streptococcus, S. aureus and more) and poop your toothbrush is exposed to many external threats. 
Someone can accidentally touch your toothbrush bristles. 
Any insects that carry bacteria, viruses and parasites may contact your toothbrush and leave behind many types of germs that can threaten your health. 
Dirty holders and other toothbrushes are other major threats.
 The same material used in antimicrobial surgical and dental trays.
Silver is the active ingredient in Brushield's anti-microbial technology.
Silver has been used for many centuries to prevent cell division, damage microbials and prevent the growth of bacteria, fungus and mold. 
Bilateral air flow channels to inhibit the growth of germs
As American Dental Association indicates germs grow faster in moist and enclosed areas. Which means toothbrushes need to dry out after every use.
Brushield allows your toothbrush to dry out by ventilation through its bilateral air flow channels to inhibit the growth of germs. 
Water evacuation holes which prevent the moisture by quickly removing the water
According to the American Dental Association, again, you have to store your toothbrush in an upright position for a better dry out. 
That's why we designed water evacuation holes at the bottom of our case, which prevents the moisture by quickly removing the water. 
Brushield prevents cross-contamination
American Dental Association recommends that, "If more than one brush is stored in the same holder or area, keep the brushes separated to prevent cross-contamination." 
Sharing a toothbrush holder could result in an exchange of body fluids and germs between the users of the toothbrushes, placing the individuals involved at an increased risk of infection. 
However, it is not easy to keep toothbrushes completely separate from others in a real household. Unless you use a Brushield.
Strong magnetic locking system
Wtih Brushield's magnetic locking system your toothbrush is safe anytime, anywhere (travel bag, pocket, etc). 
It does not unlock unexpectedly unless you want to take your toothbrush out of the case.
Brushield is perfectly designed to keep you healthier while offering a fancy appearance. 
It makes any toothbrush look more beautiful than it is. 
The standart color of Brushield is Graphite Black - RAL9011. Color upgrade to any other color is $4 per each. For packages (pledges) that include three or more Brushields color upgrades are FREE. Brushield is compatible with more than 95% of the toothbrushes in the market due to its unique design. 
All materials and pieces of Brushield are selected to make the cleaning process easier and safe. 
In order to clean your Brushield we recommend washing your case with hot water first and then placing it in anti-bacterial mouthwash forat least 15 minutes. 
We have designed a beautiful product that everyone would love to use. 
A product that should be used by every individual who wants to protect their health.
However, we need your help to get this product manufactured. 
Your pledges will be used to supply materials and produce Brushield in the finest quality. 
Follow us on FACEBOOK and INSTAGRAM!
* Anti-microbial protection does not protect against all disease-causing bacteria. Check ISO 22196/JISZ 2801:2000 test method for details. Anti-microbial protection has been tested against E. Coli and Staphylococcus aureus and the result was 99,99% neutralization of given bacteria. The method tests for both bacteriostatic (growth-inhibiting) and bactericidal (bacteria-killing) properties. The use of Brushield does not protect users against food-borne or disease-causing bacteria, viruses, germs or other disease-causing organisms. Brushield is the best existing precaution, not absolute protection.

campaign.story:
The Super Fleece is a cozy, modern, and high performance blanket for your bed. It’s designed to feel plush and familiar like your favorite hoodie, with all the performance benefits of technical apparel. 
It comes in several beautiful colors, and available exclusively on Kickstarter, is the ability to design a color combination that suits your style. 
To learn more about color options, check out the CUSTOMIZE YOUR STYLE section below.
Size: Available in Twin, Queen, and King Size, and will ship at the beginning of May, 2016.
Our flowing stitching is inspired by patterns found in nature
Traditional comforters are completely out-dated. Most use cotton duvets and down feathers, which aren't washable, and hold odor. A spill usually means a permanent stain, and patterns are generally restricted to basic diamonds and squares. 
The Super Fleece is a modern, high performance comforter.  It features beautiful organic patterns, and is made with the same materials found in technical Activewear. These materials are specifically designed to keep you dry and comfortable when you're active, and the Super Fleece offers the same benefits when you're sleeping.
The DWR knit top face sheds water, debris, and prevents stains.
The underside is an ultra-soft fleece with an antimicrobial treatment that repels bacteria and odor.
                                                     The Super Fleece is the ultimate blanket for your bed, wherever your bed may be...
By pledging, you have the ability to customize a color combination that suits your style. Once the campaign is over, we'll collect your color choices in a survey.
Customize a color combination that suites your style
Choose any of these colors for main panels or accent stripe
Click the image to learn more about Jeremy Collins and his artwork.
                Help us reach new eyes by sharing this campaign on social media!
Big thanks to Jeremy Collins and Meridian Line for this partnership!
We've teamed up with some amazing partners to bring you the ultimate sleeping experience...
Big thanks for Yellow Leaf Hammocks for their support of The Lounger Package!
Big thanks for Tuft&Needle for their support of The Snoozer Package!
Big thanks to Cascadia Vehicle Tents for their support of The Road Warrior Package!
                                                         Pillow Add-on!
We are now offering matching pillow cases as an add-on to your pledge. When the campaign is over, we'll send each backer a BackerKit survey where you'll be able to add these beautiful pillow cases to your order. The top side of the case is the same DWR knit face that's on your Super Fleece, and features a beautiful pattern that's embossed into the material. The backside is the same plush, antimicrobial material that's on the bottom side of the Super Fleece. Cases come in three different sizes that fit standard pillow dimensions, which you can find at any department store, so you'll be able to stuff them with a pillow that's to your liking.
NOTE: Pillows are only available to backers of this project. Not sold seperately.
The Rumpl story originated in the outdoors around a roaring fire. Despite significant improvements in modern textiles over the years, we were unable to find a blanket that rivaled our outdoor gear in terms of performance, warmth, and durability. Even more frustrating was the blanket buying experience - home supply mega-stores with shelves full of boring, repetitive patterns encased in clear, plastic zipper bags. We felt that there was an opportunity to create homewear that was both stylish and high-performance. We tested our first product on Kickstarter and received overwhelming support, so we decided to go all-in and set up shop. We owe our entire existence to the Kickstarter community, and would not be here offering our second product without the support form our amazing customers.
Our second offering, The Super Fleece Blanket, takes all that we've learned from our first product and applies the same rigor and attention to detail for which Rumpl has become known. The Super Fleece is a purpose-driven concept that we hope to bring to life with the support of the Kickstarter community. 
We've got a big idea at Rumpl, and it's called Active Homewear™.
When looking at the fashion industry, the last decade has seen an explosion of performance fabrics. From yoga pants, to wicking tops, everyone is beginning to see the benefits of modern textiles for everyday use. Everyone, except the homegoods industry... We believe that the textiles used in your home should meet the same performance standards as those used for active and outdoor pursuits. We've taken material inspiration from major activewear brands and applied that knowledge to the blanket on your bed. The result is Active Homewear, and it's the perfect blend of performance and comfort that you need every single day.
The Rumpl team is made up of a group of designers who spend their free time outside. We draw inspiration from the gear we use in the outdoors that keeps us comfortable doing what we love. Since our first Kickstarter campaign in early 2014 our team has grown to a modest 4 full-timers that share a passion for design, outdoor experiences, and creating great products. Between the team, we've got over 40 years of experience creating high performance consumer goods out of advanced materials. Our operation gets more dialed each week, and we are excited to get our second product in your hands. 
Co-Founders Nick Polinko and Wylie Robinson
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Since our first Kickstarter campaign almost 2 years ago, Rumpl has grown up a lot. Now, we are a full-fledged brand that operates 365 days a year selling product to customers all over the world. We've got some great experience under our belts on how to manufacture high-quality goods and fulfill lots of orders on time. We've also been blindsided more than once by completely unexpected issues, and always dealt with them in a way that leaves every last customer happy with their purchase and proud to support our company.

In short, we know what we're doing, and you should be very confident that we will deliver what we say we will, when we say we will. And we solemnly swear that should unforeseen issues come up, we will handle them with the utmost transparency and care for you, our backers.

Forecasting Risk 
If all goes well during our funding campaign, we'll finish up with a giant heap of preorders for our new products. Of course we're trying our hardest to predict our future demand and plan accordingly, but it's far from an exact science. While this ain't our first Kickstarter rodeo, our forecasting capabilities aren't the same as what you might expect from a big company.

Supply Chain Risk 
As Rumpl continues to mature we're getting better and better at managing our supply chain. For example, this year we set up two fully-operating parallel supply chains to shore up our ability to make quality products, at high volumes, on time. We've come a long way and are proud of how much we've improved. But it's safe to say that there is still some risk here. If a container shipment is delayed for 2 weeks in customs or a batch of new material doesn't pass QA testing, our fulfillment schedule—even if padded—can start to slip.

Acts of God 
We're based in San Francisco. That means we could have an earthquake. Or we could have a massive spur-of-the-moment parade involving wacky costumes and public nudity. Or, perhaps most unlikely, it rains enough to cause a flood. Whatever happens, we'll get through it together. We promise.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Light is essential in our everyday lives. We need it to see—when in cars, when finding keyholes, even when we’re outdoors. We have noticed that many everyday carry, or EDC, essentials are too dull, and current EDC flashlights are too big and bulky, so we set out to create our own.
It all started when I needed a flashlight one evening after I dropped my phone under my car. I immediately needed a light but did not have one. I thought to myself, "It would be great to have a flashlight, but the size of a bullet."
Inspired by the 9mm round.
A sleek, minimal, and beautiful design, we present to you BULLET, providing a strong LED mini flashlight in its most minimal form, while eliminating bulky flashlights from your everyday carry. Minimize your life. 
Everyday Carry Done Right
We believe that your everyday carry items are a reflection of you and your lifestyle. BULLET’S functionality, beauty, and minimalism make it the best everyday carry tiny LED flashlight available. The easiest way to carry your flashlight is on your keys! Save the space in your pockets for what truly matters.  
A quick quarter rotation on the head of the BULLET to turn it on, and a quick rotation back to turn it off. We wanted to get rid of unnecessary buttons to keep it slick and precise. A built in key chain allows you to carry BULLET with you everywhere you go.
Bullet clipped on a backpack.
Available in Matte Black, Gunmetal, and now Blue!
We took the smallest, sleekest possible design, and combined it with aircraft-grade aluminum and an anodized finish to bring you a powerful tiny LED light, perfect for everyday use. We believe that the shape, and size kept the design minimal, functional and easy to carry, completely hassle-free in any situation.
Measuring in at an incredible 10.5mm x 30mm and weighing only 6 grams, BULLET is the perfect size flashlight for modern day wear. Powered by three LR41 Button Cell batteries to produce 15 lumens of light, keep it with you at all times, anywhere you go. 
Why BULLET?
We like keeping things simple, and easy to carry around everywhere you go. What makes us different? We eliminate the bulk, weight, and hassle from traditional everyday carry flashlights, creating a seamless experience for you every single day.
 Compared to other alternatives, the choice is simple.
PLAY

Designed with aerospace-grade aluminum and a sleek anodized finish, the BULLET is built for any situation possible. Rain, sleet, hail, snow, the BULLET will illuminate in any weather, helping solve any problem. 
An LED light is ideal for everyday use over a long period of time. Never worry about breaking the light, since no glass or filament is used, or replacing it, since LEDs can last a lifetime. Battery's also last much longer with LED light, saving you both time and money in the long haul. 
What is an LED you ask? Well, for all you who don’t know, LED’s are the most efficient kind of light bulbs out on the market today. One small bulb can last you anywhere from 25,000 to 100,000 hours. Of course you'll still have to replace the batteries periodically.
We went through many iterations, finishes, and housings for the design of BULLET.
We decided to use the bottom twist due to the leverage provided by the key ring. By holding onto the keyring, twisting to turn on was easiest. Furthermore, the triangle ring offered increased stability when on a keychain.
Original Prototype Rendering 1
Original Prototype Rendering 2
Original Prototype Rendering 3
SPECIFICATIONS
Weight: 6 Grams
Width: 10.5mm
Length: 30mm
Materials: Aerospace Grade Aluminum Alloy
Battery: LR41 Button Cell
Type of Bulb: LED 5mm
Special Features: On/Off Twist Setting, and Mini Keyring Attached
Colors: Matte Black/ Gunmetal
    Slughaus is a small company based out of San Francisco with the sole mission of helping you stay minimal and functional, all at the same time. We believe that your everyday carry essentials influence your lifestyle. BULLETS' elegance inspires innovation, while its functionality keeps you minimal and on-the-go. We hope that our products not only help keep you minimal, but help mold your lifestyle as a whole.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
If BULLET is successfully funded, we will make sure everything goes according to plan to meet the promised deadline. We have manufacturing, operations, and logistics set up and ready to go. The funding raised on Kickstarter will be used for production and manufacturing. Although we do not see any direct risks and challenges, there are always unforeseen obstacles that may present themselves during the production process. We hope to run everything as streamlined as possible and also ahead of schedule to get the smallest, most elegant and functional everyday carry flashlight in your hands!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
In 1980, America made 80% of its clothes in the US; today, that number is down to 2%. Our mission is to bring manufacturing and jobs back to the US. By going American made, we are committing to making the highest quality, most durable activewear on the market.
1. Made in the USA - All of our products are proudly made in the USA. That will never change.
2. Wholesale Pricing - A better business model allows us to sell these premium products at a fraction of the retail price!  
3. Crowdsourced - You decide what we make! Crowdsourcing allows us to match up supply and demand 100% of the time. We only make what you want—no guesswork, no waste. 
4. Community - Cutting out the middleman gives us an unprecedented opportunity to connect the people who back our products to the people who make them. More transparency, more communication, and all-around more human.
Model: 5' 6" Weight 120 lbs Wearing Size Small
Model: 5' 6" Weight 120 lbs Wearing Size 4
Model: 5' 6" Weight 120 lbs Wearing Size 4
Limited Release Color - Cool Grey
Model 5' 10" Weight 180 lbs Wearing Size Medium
Model 5' 10" Weight 180 lbs Wearing Size Medium
Model 5' 10" Weight 180 lbs Wearing Size Medium
You’re probably thinking the last thing the world needs is just another active wear brand right? We think the exact same thing!
Four Athletics is certainly not that. We aren’t here to clutter store shelves with more outsourced, overpriced, mediocre-quality athletic apparel. We are here to change the way that premium active wear is bought and sold through our innovative business model which allows us to deliver top quality athletic wear at a substantial savings that would not be possible in traditional retail. Here is our story.
Ben, Matt, Casey and Cody
We are two sets of brothers who met in college and have been best friends ever since. We are “people people”—the kind of guys who want to squeeze every last drop out of life and find any reason to celebrate together. We love to laugh, we are competitive, and we’re constantly trying to out-do each other or play jokes on one another—that is, when we aren’t outdoors, in the gym, or finding another way to sweat.
A few years ago, Ben and Matt opened a gym in Southern California while Casey and Cody moved to the Bay Area to be employee #4 and #5 at a crowdfunded fashion startup. Our experience with crowdfunding exposed the outdated and costly way that the retail industry operates. It sparked many frustrated conversations about how premium quality athletic wear was getting laughably expensive and the affordable options just weren't holding up to our rigorous lifestyles. Worst of all, it was almost impossible to find anything that was made in the USA. As a group, we have a unique combination of experience in fashion, athletic competition, and the back-end/wholesale side of the clothing industry—so we decided to do something about it ourselves.
Out of these conversations, countless late nights, phone calls, meetings, and tons of work, Four Athletics was born. By leveraging the power of crowdfunding, we are able to match up supply and demand 100% of the time, and let you choose what we make. We eliminate waste, cut out the middleman, and deliver a premium quality product at a fraction of the retail price.
Four Athletics isn’t just another athletic brand, it is a better way. Join us!

CAN'T FIND THE REWARD YOU WANT?
Kickstarter limits you to backing only one reward per user. Select the reward that is closest to what you want. To add more products to your order, simply calculate the cost of the additional items and add it to the pledge amount. 
At the end of the campaign we will send you a survey where you can indicate your size and color preferences as well as any added products. If you have questions competing this process, send us a message by clicking the "contact me" link at the top of the Kickstarter page near the video.
For us, the perfect fit is just as much about looking good as it is about functionality in and out of the gym.  All of our products are designed with fit and function as the goal.  We are meticulous about every measurement and provide a comprehensive fit guide to help you identify the perfect size for you.  The 4-way stretch material has been tested on a wide range of body types and gives you that perfect athletic fit and the feeling of unlimited range of motion.  Four Athletics will give you that extra boost of confidence and help you feel as good as you look.
*We have intentionally left the inseam of our Men's and Women's pant a bit longer so you have the option of hemming them to your perfect fit.
USING THE FIT GUIDE – HOW TO DETERMINE YOUR SIZE
It is important to note that all of the fit guide measurements are off-the-body garment measurements.  If you are having trouble knowing which size is right for you, this guide will help you measure your best fitting piece of athletic wear and determine your Four Athletics sizing.  Lay your current garment on a flat surface and take each measurement according to the guide below.
That said, we are not trying to reinvent the wheel.  If you know your standard size in most major brands, you can feel confident that your Four Athletic size is the same.
 * For more measurements click here.
  * For more measurements click here.
  * For more measurements click here.
  * For more measurements click here.
  * For more measurements click here.
  * For more measurements click here.
                                                                                       Four Athletics is on the move! When we say you can wear these products anywhere, we mean it.  We put our products through every test imaginable and are confident you will love the unsurpassed quality and style. Feel good, look good, and be great whether you are giving it all you have in the gym, pushing yourself toward a higher peak, or traveling the world, Four Athletics is with you every step of the way.  
Swiss Alps
Cinque Terre
Los Angeles
Paris
Los Angeles
Florence
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
In addition to cutting out the retail markup, we are excited to remove the middleman from this equation so we can have a closer connection and transparent relationship with our supporters. We can assure you we will work tirelessly to make sure our products are delivered on schedule and communicate with you every step of the way. We have spent countless late nights dialing in our supply chain and production timeline and are confident in our shipping dates. We have considerable experience in the production side of the clothing industry and don't anticipate any hiccups at all for delivery. 

That said, if something unexpected does come up, our backers will be the first to know. We will keep you in the loop throughout the whole process, from the moment we make the first production cuts until your package is safely delivered to your door.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hi All,
Website Launch!

Hi from Four Athletics,
We wanted to send you a quick note to say Happy New Year and give you an update on the production process.  We keep moving forward and the fabric rolls and trims have arrived at our factory in Southern California.  We are compiling all the data from the survey and making sure all of our ducks are in a row for on-time production and delivery. 
Many New Year's resolutions are about changes.  You have helped change the way premium active wear is bought and sold and provide an alternative to an outdated, outsourced, and overpriced retail model We are excited for what 2016 will bring and couldn't be happier to have you along for the ride.  Thank you all for your continued support and for helping make made in the USA premium athletic wear possible.

Our campaign ends Friday! 
It has been a whirlwind of excitement and hard work throughout the last month and we are stoked to have had you along for the ride. Let us take a minute to recap and tell you what to expect moving forward.
Looking Back

campaign.story:
Shooz are highly innovative patented footwear that are made for traveling and allow you to mix-and-match your favorite designs, customizing your shoes for any occasion.
Shooz are made of a "Skin" and a "Sole which are detachable and interchangeable and allow you to create a style that’s perfect for you and perfect for any occasion. Whether you’re traveling, biking, running, working or just going out for a night on the town, you can carry around your flat-packed skins and customize Shooz to fit any occasion. Just choose your styles of Skin and Sole, zip them together and get going!
Shooz are made up of two different, interchangeable parts: a Shooz Skin and a Shooz Sole. Connect the ends of the skin and the sole special waterproof zipper, just like you would with a jacket. Once the zippers are linked, close the snap fastener on the heel and your Shooz are ready to go! You can customize and get creative just by choosing from the variety of skins and soles, giving you tons of footwear options for any occasion. 
With Shooz, we want to give you a unique style for every occasion. We have everything from workout soles to more casual, urban soles that you can mix-and-match with a multitude of different colored skins. Don’t let price hold you up from looking your best.
You can finally stop settling on which shoes to take on a trip when there’s no more room in your suitcase. Make more space for clothes and souvenirs and still have a variety of different footwear with Shooz! Just lay the Shooz Skins flat in your luggage or backpack - EACH PAIR WILL TAKE UP THE SPACE OF A T-SHIRT.
Just unzip the skin from the sole, throw it in the wash - you’ll get a deeper cleaning and faster drying than you ever would with a regular pair of shoes.
A nice pair of running shoes can cost over $100 a pair, and don’t even get us started on dress shoes. Stop spending a fortune and start saving with Shooz. Once you get your first pair of soles, you can create new combinations by getting new Shooz Skins at $75 and, as you increase your collection, you decrease your cost per shoe!
Research shows that the manufacturing process used to make the sole of a normal shoe is what leaves the largest carbon footprint. Luckily, by sharing one sole with different skins Shooz provides a solution to drastically decrease the number of soles produced.
 Don't worry about guessing your shoe size, we’ll send out a survey at the end of the campaign to get your size right with our smart app ShoeSize.Me. Based on a shoe which you currently own and fits perfectly our app will find your ideal fit for Shooz. The results are created through a data-driven algorithm that is based on the previous experiences of other customers. Our size recommendation draws on a database of millions of data points and includes over 1,000 brands and 20,000 shoe models.
Edoardo | Founder of Shooz
Edoardo has worked as an industrial designer in studios between New York and Milan. He has successfully designed, launched and managed Veeshoo footwear brand (www.veeshoo.com), a patented flat-packable shoe that constitutes a first step to the conception of Shooz’s idea. From 2011 to 2015 he has developed his brand in the European and Asian markets and has since licensed it so he can dedicate all of his energies on Shooz. Has been assigned the Vogue Accessory Award, for innovation in footwear design in 2012.
Flavia | Designer
Flavia, launched her own label in 2012 after apprenticing with some of the biggest names in the fashion world, including Valentino, Prada, and Vivienne Westwood. Interchangeable – Customizable – Feminine - Sustainable - are the key words of her innovative designs that match perfectly with Shooz’s philosophy. So who would better than her to design two special edition skins for the Kickstarter collection?
Giorgio | Manager
Giorgio, finance professional at a global investment firm, is the manager mind behind the Shooz project. He takes care of finance, logistics and legal issues. Without him, we would probably be bankrupt!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Risks and Challenges are a part of every business, but we’ve done our best to keep them minimal when it comes to our product. Shooz are made from some of the highest quality materials which means that we’ve got to make sure our manufacturing is done right. There is always a risk of delays when it comes to manufacturing, but we’re committed to working with the best manufacturers and product designers to bring you the best quality products. We’re dedicated to getting Shooz created and into the hands (or should we say feet) of our backers in a timely manner, which is why we strategically set our shipping dates to be realistic in order to minimize any setbacks.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
A part of you might have changed address since when you first completed our surveys, some of you have already sent us notification of their new address, for the ones that still haven't please:
a) send us a private message with your new address using Kickstarter messanger
b) send us an email at edoardo@acbc.com

Dear Backers, 
The bulk shipment of our pre-orders was held in China for bureaucracy reasons, the customs had never seen such a product and didn’t know how to classify it. I just went this weekend to clear documents to release the goods and do a general quality check. The products are amazing, check out this video of my travel to the factory: https://youtu.be/TI958ynmQ2A . The estimated arrival in our warehouse in Italy is end of August and shipments will start on first week of September. i’ll keep you posted of course if there are any problems but we should be almost 100% there. The products are amazing and this is the most important thing, that after all the waiting you will finally receive a perfect product.

Dear Backers,
We have just started our deliveries! So glad we finally got there... this is amazing, thanks to you and our other backers which believed in our idea and project we finally made it to where we are now. I know it has been frustrating to wait all this time, but honestly you have no idea of the Odissey that i and all the people involved in this project had to go through. Numerous travels in different parts of the world, trying all the possible factories, endless research and calculation on the zipper interchangeability, trying to control the micron. If it wasn't for you we would have never arrived to target, thanks for your support, especially in the difficult moments. I am so grateful and can't wait to get your feedbacks. You guys are amazing! You will receive soon a tracking number of the shipment, shippings will finish at the end of June so if you don't receive any tracking number by end of June please let me know!

Dear Backers,
There was a Typo error in the last update: 30 of February.
The actual delivery date is 1st of March.
Best,

Dear Backers, 
I am sorry that no update was posted to keep you informed on the situation. It has been very hard to reach the needed productive standards of the zipper in order to make our shoe and we have passed a lot of time working in the research of a solution.
The solution has been finally found and the standard achieved.

Dear Backers, 
I have just came back from our factory where the products are being packaged. The pre-orders production batch is being packed and shipped to our warehouse in UK from where we will ship the shoes to the different backers around the world, This means that we will be starting our shippings on the 15th of October. I know you have been way too patient and had to wait unexpectedly a long time before receiving your shoes, we have been working really hard on the realisation of our first mass production which has encountered many obstacles, which have slowed us down but never stopped us! As soon as your package is dispatched you will be notified a tracking number by email. Please contact me if you still haven’t received an email by the 5th of October and feel free to ask if you have any query.

Dear Backers,
I have just got back from our new factory in China and i'm really glad to tell you these guys are making a great job.

Dear Backers,
Please excuse me if it has been almost a month since my last update but i have been working 24/7 on production and quality issues.
After endless trials and errors we have finally got the quality standard under control and managed to get the alignment of the skins and soles right and up to standard for mass production. It has been a really hard process in which most of the people working on the product didn't believe there would be light at the end of the tunnel but i have always believed we would have succeeded and as promised, delivered the product in your hands.

campaign.story:
Blue-Red G-RO
Stealth Black G-RO
G-RO is the world's first bag in a whole new category: it's a companion bag—a bag specifically designed to accompany on-the-go people, whether they are traveling around the block or around the globe. 
We all know travel can be a hassle. The more you do it, the more tiring and frustrating it becomes. To get from here to there, too many of us depend on inferior bags, travel gear and accessories. 
So, we set out to design a bag that is better than anything else available. Here are six reasons we think G-RO really is different, and better, than any other bag:
PLAY

1. G-RO IS YOUR COMPANION BAG
It's a new kind of crossover bag: a companion bag. We designed it for on-the-go people to be large enough to take on a week-long trip yet maneuverable, durable and light enough for your daily commute.
2. WHEEL INNOVATION
All other rolling luggage is basically a box on casters. Their little wheels break more often; they travel badly over bumps, bricks, grates, snow and sand; they weaken the luggage design with more rivets, screws and reinforcements; they require more parts to assemble and break; they reduce the available volume; and they often cause awkward nooks in the interior space.  
But because of our ingenious patented wheel design, G-RO:  
feels lighter: the center of gravity of the load is closer of the center of the wheels;
rolls easier: the big wheels perform so much better over all terrains, and glide effortlessly on smooth surfaces;
lasts longer: the case and wheels are integrally designed and reinforce each other; 
packs smarter: there's more interior space than other bags of similar weight and volume;
looks better: form follows function, and these wheels tell you this is smart design.
3. TOP-NOTCH HANDLING
Our aircraft-grade aluminum handle is longer and stronger, too. It extends six inches further than the industry standard, with stops at multiple levels for people of all heights. This gives you better leverage than other rollaboards, and makes it extra comfortable to pull your G-RO.
4. BUILT TOUGH
We designed G-RO from the strongest and smartest materials:
Ballistic nylon
Aerospace and firearm-grade polymers
Top-quality YKK nylon zippers with a unique (and patented) "roller coaster" design that distributes any stress
Waterproof base and arched belly to stay dry and avoid scrapes.
5. ROOM FOR WORK AND PLAY
A spacious interior compartment for personal items
A compartment for work items — and it can charge your laptop while you travel
An easy access pocket for carry-on liquids
A personal pocket for essentials.
6. SUPER POWER
G-RO has a built-in tablet stand and charging station with two USB ports. And with the Optional Electronic Module, your G-RO has:
A battery with enough juice (23,000 mAh) to charge your phone, tablet and laptop all at once—that's enough power to charge your smartphone 10X
A universal power outlet to charge your laptop
A location tracker
A wireless proximity detector.
REINVENTING THE WHEEL
Most luggage is literally a drag. Back in 1596, the term “luggage” was coined from the word “lug” which means “to drag.” Surprisingly, over 400 years later, most of us are still lugging around our bags. Rollaboards were developed in the 1980's, but their small wheels, while an improvement, still haven’t done much to make a bag feel lighter.
Take a look at our wheels and we think you'll see why they work so much better:
G-RO's wheels make the bag to feel lighter while also being more spacious and more durable.
Because of their large diameter, the wheels support the load closer to its center of gravity, so your bag balances better and feels significantly lighter when you pull it. 
G-RO glides easily over any kind of terrain—cobblestones, curbs, steps, gravel, snow, sand.
Because our wheels are on the outside of the bag, our bag offers a larger packable space compared to typical rolling bags.
Our wheels are made of super strong aerospace and firearm-grade polymers that strengthen the walls of the bag. Unlike traditional bags, the wheels are the strength of this bag—not the weakness.
LONG, STRONG, ERGONOMIC HANDLE
G-RO's aircraft grade aluminum four-stage telescoping handle is more than six inches longer than the industry standard! The handle stops at multiple levels and is great for people of all heights. It provides better leverage and comfort.
SUPER STRONG MATERIALS
The body of G-RO is made of high quality Cordura ballistic nylon and mold-injected aerospace-grade polymers. It’s crush proof and water resistant, keeping your belongings safe and sound.
The zippers are high quality YKK zippers.  G-RO’s unique “roller coaster” zipper design helps distribute any stress across the zipper, creating a longer zipper life.
ARCHED BELLY DESIGN AND WATERPROOF BASE
G-RO’s arched belly design ensures the bag doesn’t scrape on the ground. 
To protect your items from water damage, G-RO's bottom protective panel consists of a plastic shell over a waterproof, plastic-coated ballistic nylon textile to ensure that nothing gets wet. 
WORK PLAY COMPARTMENTS FOR WORK LIFE BALANCE
G-RO has an internal compartment for your personal items and an external compartment for your work items, because no one likes to show their “unmentionables” at a business meeting (or at least most people).
G-RO helps your private items stay private, but gives you immediate easy access to the items you need while traveling or working. 
SPACIOUS INTERIOR COMPARTMENT FOR PERSONAL ITEMS
G-RO’s spacious and private interior compartment is flat-backed for easier packing. It includes: 
A detachable flat packing divider for items you want to keep separate or wrinkle-free, 
Plenty of mesh pockets for packing options, 
A removable garment bag for your dress clothes. 
"NO FISHING" COMPARTMENT FOR WORK ITEMS
Ever feel like you’re blindly fishing for items in your bag? G-RO solves that problem with its organized, easy-access external compartment. It includes padded pockets for your 15” laptop and plenty of other places for your tablet, papers, pens, etc. 
With G-RO's Optional Electronic Module, you can charge your laptop while it's in the laptop pocket by connecting your laptop charger to the universal power outlet located at the bottom of the compartment. See the "Optional Electronic Module" section for more details.
CARRY-ON LIQUIDS POCKET
Breeze through security with this waterproof pocket, especially designed to fit your carry-on liquids.
PERSONAL POCKET FOR ESSENTIALS
This easy access pocket holds your passport or any other essential items you want to keep safe and close to you. 
BUILT-IN CHARGING STATION AND TABLET STAND
A Built-In Charging Station is built into the top of each G-RO. This waterproof charging station includes: 
2 iPad-strength USB outlets 
Space for small cables or pens
NOTE: To charge your devices from the Built-In Charging Station, you must first purchase and connect the G-RO Optional Electronic Module or your own portable charger to the charging cables located in G-RO’s interior compartment. See the "Optional Electronic Module" section below for details.
Built-In Charging Station. *Cable not included.
When open, the Built-In Charging Station functions as a tablet stand! 
Built-In Tablet Stand
OPTIONAL ELECTRONIC MODULE
The Optional Electronic Module (a $175 value) includes:
A 23,000 mAh battery
2 USB ports (that connect to built-in wires, which power the Built-In Charging Station on the top of the bag)
1 universal power outlet (that fits a three prong laptop plug)
A location tracker 
A proximity detector
With G-RO’s Optional Electronic Module, you can charge your laptop, tablet and smartphone all at once.
To purchase this Optional Electronic Module, add $99 for each unit at on the final pledge screen.
*Universal power outlet extension cord provided with Optional Electronic Module.
The Optional Electronic Module plugs into 2 USB cords, located in the bottom pocket of the bag. These cords run through the interior of the bag and connect to and power the Built-In Charging Station at the top of the bag.
Because we’re confident in G-RO’s durability and we think it will stay with you for years, we chose not to build the Optional Electronic Module into the bag. We realize that electronics often need an upgrade or need to be replaced. We also wanted to give you the option of using the module outside of G-RO! 
PORTABLE BATTERY
The Optional Electronic Module's 23,000 mAh battery is strong enough to charge your smartphone up to 10 times! 
 LOCATION TRACKER AND PROXIMITY DETECTOR
G-RO's Optional Electronic Module uses GSM-GPRS technology for location tracking and Bluetooth Smart/Bluetooth Low Energy technology for proximity detection. Any connected device can then be used to track the global location and proximity of your G-RO. 
You’ll never lose your G-RO or have to join the crowd at the baggage carousel unnecessarily. You'll be alerted if the bag gets too far away from you. 
Our app is compatible with iOS and Android smart phones that support BLE (Bluetooth Low Energy). 
The exact specifications are subject to minor changes as we optimize the design for mass production. The weight and capacity are based on computer generated analysis.
After the campaign ends, we will send out a survey so you can choose your color.
Shipping Rates
We offer FREE SHIPPING to the United States. For the rest of the world, please check your shipping rate on the check-out menu while backing the project.
GUARANTEED FOR LIFE ...   
We designed and build G-RO to last a lifetime and we stand behind the quality and durability of our products. If your bag ever breaks down, just ship it back to us. We'll either repair it or replace it, and return it to you. It's our lifetime guarantee to you.
...BECAUSE THAT'S HOW WE ROLL.
The latest “game-changing” luggage configuration - the four-wheel “spinner“ luggage with 360 degree turning capabilities, was introduced globally by Samsonite in 1990, more than 25 years ago, but the problem with four-wheel luggage is that it doesn’t really work anywhere except on a perfectly flat surface.
More than half of the time people carry their four-wheeled bags in a tilted position, because it’s far more comfortable. If you’re moving over a rough surface, it’s impossible to pull a four-wheeled bag. You’re basically just dragging the weight. Ergonomically, it’s better for you to have the bag pulled slightly behind you than directly at your side. In tight spaces, it’s nearly impossible to roll a bag by your side, so four-wheel users tilt the bag and pull it behind themselves to cut through a crowd. Lastly, if the bag is heavy, maneuvering it can become tiring on the wrist, and with today’s mega terminals, it can be hard to push them for long distances.
Besides the impracticality of using a four-wheel bag in many scenarios, the four-wheel bags have wheels that protrude and therefore are more likely to catch and break. It’s particularly inconvenient when it’s the ones you need for walking with the bag tilted. Lastly, despite these negatives, one still must pay a 20-30% premium price for these four-wheeled models.
We've now finalized our G-RO prototype, but moving to the production phase requires significant capital and scale. We need your help to finance the required tooling and meet minimum order quantities. We've spent months and months working out the tiniest and biggest details of this project, and are very excited about finally having the opportunity to bring the comfort and beauty of G-RO to each one of you.
Kickstarter is a proven start-up platform, whose community of “early adopters” vets, funds and helps refine new products and services in an efficient, timely manner. The traditional retail model involving distributors, middlemen and retail outlets is costly and adds no value to the actual product or service around which the manufacturer/customer relationship is formed. In fact, it is a major impediment for entrepreneurs, who want to realize their vision for a new consumer product. Therefore, we highly value the Kickstarter community and its role in supporting innovation and hope that together we can launch G-RO.
This project is promoted by Jellop, a direct­ response online advertising agency specializing in Kickstarter campaigns on Facebook Ads and Google AdWords.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
While manufacturing a product has become easier in today's well-connected world, it’s still quite a complex challenge. To best prepare for the challenges ahead, we've partnered with supply chain and manufacturing experts and have recruited advisers and board members, who can provide expert advice and help us tackle challenges in production, engineering and retail management.

We have developed our plan for manufacturing in Asia and for shipping to our backers around the world. We have sourced the factories for all of G-RO’s major components. For the last five years, we've been developing long-term working relationships with these manufacturers, and they have been invaluable and active partners during our prototype development phase. They have approved the G-RO design for its manufacturability and are committed to its success. During the production process, we expect to make minor changes to optimize the design for mass production. On the logistics side, we have established partnerships with a US fulfillment house and international shippers to help the G-ROs get to where they’re going quickly and safely.

Although it's difficult to plan for every unforeseen circumstance, such as political or economic events that might delay production or delivery, we've created contingency plans should these type of problems arise. Nevertheless, we are certain to face unexpected challenges throughout this journey and will do our best to solve them quickly. We pledge to keep our backers well-informed in a timely manner throughout the entire production process and to do everything we can to deliver the G-ROs to you as planned.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Let's face it. Most pants & shorts are AWFUL. If you're lucky enough to squeeze into a pair that sort of fits, they offer so little range of motion that you may as well be wearing a body cast. 

As a result you've hung up your fashionable pants & shorts in exchange for sweats, yoga pants and work out shorts that at least don't make your feet go numb. 

We're here to prove things can be different. You deserve REAL pants. Pants that feel great, provide a classic look, and perform like your best athletic wear. 
Using technologically advanced fabrics -- and a design built from the ground up to support freedom of movement -- we've made the Athletic Chino Pants and Shorts. 
Fashionable, modern pants and shorts that provide the performance and comfort of high-tech athletic wear. 
Every stitch, every seam, and every detail of our clothing is painstakingly designed and scrutinized. We will give you a perfect fit, complete comfort, and most importantly limitless freedom to move your body.
1.) We've delivered over 15,000 pairs of pants to satisfied customers. We're experts at fabric & fit, and know you'll be amazed by these new Athletic Chino Pants & Shorts.
 2.) We promise you'll absolutely love the fit of your pants and shorts, and back it up with a free exchange anywhere in the US. 

*International customers can exchange too! But are responsible for return and exchange shipping.

campaign.story:
It started as an obsession to find a comfortable pair of jeans that you could put on in the morning and wear cycling, hiking or climbing, and still look stylish for a meeting or night out. This was the foundation for Boulder Denim. Knowing that there are many pants with many features we decided to design a pant that included the most useful of those features, making them the most functional and stylish jeans on the market.
Our sizing guarantee to YOU:
In the year we spent developing Boulder Denim we realized a few important things about fit and sizing.
For women, we discovered that we could completely simplify the fitting process when we finally settled on the blend that makes up our patented ultra-stretch denim. After testing our woman’s cut on women that are both slim and curvy, we were able to design a single cut that fits virtually all body types.
Because men don’t typically wear skin tight clothing it was important to design a cut that sits naturally on a man’s lower body, while not being overly tight. This discovery lead to the creation of our two fits, SLIM and ATHLETIC.
We are so confident with our sizing that if your jeans don’t fit, all you do is send them back to us and we will send you another pair on us.
*Customers outside of North America will be charged an additional $20 for international shipping.
 FOR MEN:
To determine your fit, there are two key measurements.
First, measure the smallest part of your waist at your natural waistline. Second, measure your thigh 2 inches below your crotch Then cross reference, your waist and thigh measurement with the sizing chart to determine your fit. Men looking for a skinny fit can size down. The denim will stretch to your body.
FOR WOMEN:
You only need to measure the smallest part of your waist at your natural waistline. Our jeans are so incredibly stretchy to ensure an absolutely skin tight fit we recommend sizing down.
Made with the climber in mind and created to truly combine fashion and adventure for a slimmer fit you can wear anytime.
Medium rise that sits just above the hip, slim through the thigh, knee and calf with a slight taper
Offers a perfectly tailored fit that works for men with slim to medium legs.
Fits well for slim or medium builds as the taper increases proportionally with waist size.
BEST FOR: Men with slim to medium legs that want a tailored look.
For the gym rat, crossfitter or bodybuilder. This fit is muscular-glute approved and designed for men that spend a lot time in the gym.
Medium rise that sits just above the hip, more room through the thigh, knee and calf with a slight taper.
Offers more thigh and calf room for men with muscular legs.
BEST FOR: Men with big legs that have trouble finding pants that can accommodate their thighs. These are for the crossfitter, bodybuilder or football player that never skips leg day. They also look great on men with thicker legs or larger builds that are looking for a roomier fit.
Designed to combine our 360-degree stretch and a perfect cut that embraces the natural movement of a woman’s body. The stretch is perfect for women of all shapes.
Medium/Higher rise, that is meant to move with you as your body bends.
The ultra-stretch denim allows you to have a higher-waist that doesn’t restrict movement or dig in when you bend over.
BEST FOR: Women that are slim to very curvy. The denim is so unbelievably stretchy that it will hug even the most curvaceous women.
So rest assured and order with confidence that not only will these pants fit you perfectly and feel amazing, your butt will look phenomenal!
The Boulder Denim brand was inspired by necessity and created by adventurists. We know what it’s like having to balance our thirst for thrill and everyday responsibilities. Which is why created our denim to cater to whatever it is your day has in store for you. Aside from selling comfortable pants, we wanted to be the true advocates for adventure and we’ll do this by giving back to you, our amazing community. 
#1 | Every year a portion of our earnings will go towards our “What’s your adventure?” campaign. You tell us what your idea of an epic getaway would be and the person with the best trip will be decided upon by the Boulder Denim community. The prize being the trip you dreamt and 2016’s trip that will be accompanied by world record highliner, Spencer Seabrooke and the boulder denim team. 
#2 | The “Everyday Athlete Sponsorship Program” (EASP). We realized that like ourselves, we all lead busy lives, yet we still find time to train hard. Our skill is built on our dedication. We want to give back to these athletes in recognition of their hard work and inspiration they bring to others. This means support and of course free Boulder Denim gear.
A huge thank you to these companies for allowing us to shoot in their establishments. 
The Hive
Portland Craft 
Milano Coffee 
Revolver Coffee
The General Public 
And thank you to Rich Emmerson @ travelshootshare.com  and Tanner Dunn @ thefrvr.com for their incredible photography work.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
1. We already have people testing out our pre-production samples around the globe. We're ready to hit "go" on production immediately after we receive our funds from Kickstarter. This is usually two weeks after our campaign ends successfully.

2. Our stain repellent and hydrophobic technology can be done a number of ways. Choosing the type of technology will depend on how many pairs of jeans we sell. Some methods are quicker than others and it could potentially delay the estimated delivery time by up to 30 days. 

3. Other delays and unforeseen obstacles may occur along the way but this is highly unlikely as we're equipped to produce a very large quantity of jeans.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Last Chance for Direct-to-Consumer Pricing and Tour Update
updates.update_content:
Hey guys,
It's been a while since we last updated you so here's the latest:
Direct to Consumer Pricing: Since we launched back in November 2015 we've had a direct-to-consumer pricing model. We were able to offer you lower pricing since we didn't have any distributors and weren't in retailers yet. With our big tour coming up and tons of stores requesting wholesale pricing, our retail pricing will be changing from $129 USD to $148 USD (or $174 CAD to $198 CAD). The good news is you have until April 1st, 2017 to snag a pair or two at the discounted direct-to-consumer pricing. and grab a pair now!

updates.update_userinfo: We're just getting started! Big things happening in 2017.
updates.update_content: It's been a while since our last update and we've got some exciting updates for you.
Happy Holidays from our unofficial mascot Koda and the Boulder Denim team.

Hey Backers!
We're happy to announce that all orders have been shipped and that a lot of you have already received your jeans. We've already heard some great feedback from our backers on Twitter and Instagram. Keep your posts coming, we love hearing your praise!
US/International Orders: Many of you have already received your jeans. If you're looking for your tracking information, you should be able to see it now when you go to  and enter your email address.

Hey Backers!
We have a quick update for you today. 
ALL US and International orders were shipped out over the past two days. You'll receive them either Fedex Home Delivery or USPS Priority Mail. We're having an issue with tracking numbers. You should be able to login to BackerKit.com and view your tracking information but it's not working like it's suppose to. We're working hard with BackerKit today to solve this issue so you'll be able to track your packages.

Hey backers!
We know we said that the jeans should be shipping out to you now but as you know, we keep stumbling across delays. The freight from our manufacturing facility in Quebec to our fulfilment centres in Vancouver and Chicago has taken longer than expected. For some reason (most likely distance related), our Chicago fulfilment centre received the pallets first. The freight to our Vancouver warehouse is still in transit and we were told by the freight company today that it will arrive at our Vancouver fulfilment centre on November 7th or 8th.

Hi Backers!
Last week we updated you with a timeline and shipping address change requests. This week we would like to update you again on where we're at with shipping.
Orders Without Jeans:
All t-shirts, chalk buckets, hats, and tanks have shipped if there was no jean order attached with them. Some of you may have already received your gear.

updates.update_userinfo: Last call for address and sizing changes
updates.update_content:
Hello backers!
We're so excited to announce that two out of our three styles have finished production with the third being wrapped up sometime next week. This means that you all have one week to email us with any size or address changes. If you won't be home to accept the package, we highly recommend shipping it to a friend or family member instead.
You have until next Friday, October 21st at 8:00am PST to send us any changes.

campaign.story:
Do you dream of dress shoes as comfortable as your sport shoes ?  
If you walk to work, travel a lot, or are on your feet all day, stay energized with the world's best absorption and rebound on dress shoes!
Whereas all well known brands are making soles of dress shoes with hard materials like wood, leather, hard rubber or hard EVA, that makes them painful, Maratown use an innovative and disruptive SUPER SOFT SOLE, twice more CUSHIONED than other dress shoes, thanks to cutting edge EVA's foam used by the best running shoes brands .
After months of works, we approved the Maratown with 15 FEATURES
                                                          After testing in laboratory dozens and dozens of comfortable shoes for women and men, we insure that Maratown are the most comfortable dress shoes for standing all day, working and walking.

1-Measure your length foot - please take the extreme back end of your heel.
2-Convert with the size guide below
3-Adjust:
Fine foot: if your size matches exactly, select that exact size; if you are halfway between 2 sizes, select the smaller size.
Normal foot: if your size matches exactly, select that exact size; if you are halfway between 2 sizes, select the larger size.
Wide foot: if your size matches exactly, select one size larger; if you are halfway between 2 sizes, select the larger size + 1 size.
 In case of your shoe fit a little too large, we offer in all shoebox:  
-Heel liners, a piece of stuck leather that you can stick on the inside heel to improve shoe fit. Be sure to test it before sticking it.
-Volume adjustment insole, to insert under the leather insole. 
If you are still not satisfied, we accept exchanges.  For more details about the exchange, please refer to the exchange part of the FAQ.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Maratown™'s aim is to help people all around the world to keep moving, by developing new styles and new shoe products, with a focus on being the world’s best cushioned dress shoes. We are ambitious and have the means to succeed. We have been working on this project for almost one year now and considered each step equally important. We built a strong control on our supply chain by meeting dozens of experts and hundreds of suppliers, testing the shoes in a laboratory as well as in real conditions. We selected our suppliers based on their technology's features, quality of products, delivery time, and "happy to work with" relationship. We also have strong partners on the shipment and administrative side.
However, working with other suppliers and manufacturers does open up the possibility for delays. You can believe us when we tell you that the customer’s satisfaction is our top priority and every day we strive to deliver your Maratown™ in great quality and on time.
All throughout the campaign and the production, we will be very happy to keep you frequently updated. 
Expected delivery is between January and February.
Note that what you are seeing are prototypes, so you can expect the final product to be more polished.
If you have any questions, please contact Nancy, chief evangelist at Maratown™ at nancy@maratown.com.

campaign.story:
Shipping Rate Rebate!!
We've heard your feedback about the $50 shipping fee and we've found a new shipping option! But we can't change the rewards. So if you live in a region where the shipping on your reward costs $50 we will refund you $25 at the end of the project. (within 3 weeks through Paypal directly to your credit card.)
               You don’t want to be sweaty, damp, cold, uncomfortable or improperly dressed for any given moment. This is modern life; unpredictable and ever changing. You need to be able to adapt while on the go, and your clothing needs to adapt too. We want to change this..because we have the technology to give you the best of all those worlds.
Pants that perform for every part of your day..and life.
Our Fabric:
We created a fabric infused with performance fibers so that you can be comfortable all day long even if you are doing a number of different activities.
Work pants, sweat pants, running pants, dress pants, cycling pants all in one pant. How? Nature2X combines four fibers that interact with each other to increase the beneficial performance features of each fiber while offsetting the weaknesses of each fibre; woven together you get fabric perfection.
Tencel: moisture absorbing, naturally anti bacterial and odor resistant
Polyester: durable, quick dry
Cotton: breathable and comfortable
Spandex: maximum stretch and memory
The foundation of Nature2X fabric is Tencel® because it absorbs moisture from your skin and stores in inside the fiber so that you don't feel wet but your skin still has access to enough moisture to feel comfortable. (Your skin always needs a certain level of moisture to avoid irritation. The added bonus is that Tence®l naturally stops bacteria from growing too-no smell.
However, Tencel® is a limp fiber that expands over time so we added polyester for hold, strength and durability. The downside of polyester is that it attracts bacteria and causes irritation on your skin if it makes up a large percentage of a fabric because it doesn't hold any moisture at all.
Polyester adds the strength and Tencel adds the intelligence; moisture management. Then we added cotton to the mix for natural breathability and extra comfort. Cotton is a soft, natural fiber that is also very durable over time.
Finally, we add spandex so that the fabric will stretch everywhere across it's surface giving the garment flexibility and memory.

We need your help to go into full production with this amazing fabric. We've been testing this fabric in various raw material combinations over the last 2 years. We released a small test run (V.1) last spring and now we've perfected the mix in this Nature2X (V.2) We have big dreams and believe that this pant truly will change the way you feel throughout every part of your day. We want to bring you freedom with fashion and function in one pant. We know that once you try this pant on you will have a hard time going back to traditional clothing. So help us make this pant a reality.
We are the people who brought you the most technically advanced denim ever made. Our purpose is to build the best pants in the world. We’re a team of pant enthusiasts, designers and active, urban/outdoor dwellers looking for more from our clothing options. Together we have over 100 years of experience developing pants for fashion and technical outdoor wear. We are based out of our design studio in Vancouver, Canada and our new sales office in New York. Your contribution is helping us grow to create more functional yet stylish clothing. We greatly appreciate your support!

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Building the best fitting performance pants in the world is not an easy task. It takes years of training and experience to make a pant pattern that fits in all the right places and moves as you do. Luckily for you, we've done this before. Our last Kickstarter project was a success! We delivered our L2X denim on time and people loved the fit, performance and quality of our product.

Since our last project we've been able to build relationships a number of retailers and maintain ongoing sales of our performance denim. Unfortunately, we were late delivering our stretch goal (black L2X denim) because it was added at the last minute and the first fabric did not pass our quality standards. To overcome this issue we won't be adding any new stretch goal products to this project.

We've been testing and trial wearing our Nature2X fabric for over a year. We even did a small production run(V.1) last spring to ensure that we could meet our quality standards on the first production. After reconfiguring our raw materials we then retested production. All of these steps lead us to the newest and most complete version of the fabric from which we have created this project. (V.2).

With the success of the first project we have have added more people to our small team to insure that every detail, from development to delivery, will be smooth and on time. We are confident that you will get your pants on time and love them for years to come. Thank you for your support!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Cotton shirts have existed for centuries. The first shirt to be discovered was found into a tomb dating back to the first Egyptian dynasty.



If we take a deep look at it, the classic white cotton shirt hasn’t evolved that much since the beginning of the 20th century. And yet, our lifestyles have changed, technology has improved. Unlike watches, glasses, the most low-tech of all “wearables” is the one we wear the most. We believe innovation should change your everyday life.
Le Lab is a new French elegant apparel brand with the ambition to revolutionize men’s clothing using innovative fabrics, starting with the classic white cotton shirt. 
We combined what we believe is the best of style, cut and fabric:
Our first collection was built seeking harmony between pure white fabric and rough dark metal. 
Our stylists first looked for inspiration and then started drawing.
Once the models of the first collection were designed, we prototyped them. 
You can discover our first collection in this "behind the scenes" video of our photoshoot:
PLAY

Among these models, the one we offer as a reward is the "Essential" shirt:
We collaborated with one of the most renowned French tailor to find the perfect fitted cut. 
We also included luxury details
We settled our offices at the European Center of Innovative Textiles in Lille, France, to develop a unique cotton fabric, inspired by the latest sportswear, medical and military technological advances in innovative fabrics. 
CETI (Center of European Textile Intelligence)
After nearly 2 years of R&D, we are now able to produce a fabric which is
Today, we are the only company in the world to combine all 3 properties.
Every time the fabric changes, the technology also changes. With the delicate and thin fabric of a cotton shirt, 3 challenges needed to be answered 
We also offer self-cleaning silk ties in our first collection. 
The "self-cleaning" technology on silk ties already existed - as a matter of fact it's easier as you don't wash them. We worked on style and high quality. And who wants to stain its tie when he cannot stain his shirt?
These shirts have been almost 2 years in the making! They have already been fully developed, prototyped and tested by textile and fashion professionals. We now need backers' funds to launch the first batch:
This is how your money will be spent:
By Sébastien François, CEO
After studying at HEC Paris and MIT Sloan, I became a consultant, like many of my classmates. I had to wear a tuxedo on a daily basis and even if I like to be classy, maintaining that look was often adding to an already stressful life.
I looked for innovative clothes that could also fit my fashion and quality requirements, but found nothing adequate (sorry for past Kickstarter projects – I will be glad to explain you what didn’t suit me and how different Le Lab is). I’m convinced I’m not the only one in this situation and if it’s your case, this is your chance to solve it.
Pauline Guesné, graduated from EM Lyon and also former consultant became my business partner soon after. She brought her skills and the feminine perspective needed to go even further in style. I cannot emphasis enough how crucial she is in our organization.  

We would never have achieved this quality level without all our past and current employees: Guillaume Olivier, Baptiste Garnier, Maxime Flahaut, Floriane Fossoul, Roberto Ruiz Munoz, Eugénie Frambach, Arnaud Pioffet, Sylvain Fessard, Pamela Peepson, Camille Moinaux, Charles Lanceron and Pierre-Guillaume Béchu. Thanks to all of you and keep up the good work!
If you support us, you will be invited to choose one of the following rewards: 
Please note that your size and your choice of model will be asked to you when the crowdfunding ends. Here are the available sizes:
We had 5 sizes previously but we increased it to 7 (adding XS and XXXL) because we reached our first stretch goal of €20,000.
Regarding shirts, only the "Essential" model is available. For ties, you will be able to choose between black, silver and blue.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
With our shirts being so unique, we had to find suppliers able to master our technology and to meet our quality requirements. In order to find them, we literally searched the world. The final manufacturing process is carried out in 3 steps
1. We buy high quality cotton yarn and make them woven. 
2. Our finishing experts process and dye them. 
3. The clothes are made in highly qualified European fashion studios for perfect finishes.

Our relationship with our partners is built on trust, reliability and a shared commitment to excellence. We are confident we will succeed in fulfilling every order perfectly. However, the unexpected is unpredictable (!) and given our complex fabrication process, an unfortunate event could always delay the production process.

To prevent this from happening we already took precautions in the delivery date we announced you. And no matter what, we will be in contact with you at every step of the way.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
